33 ʋae ʔn ti ʔn hɛʔ ʋi ho gaːkhraaɔ, kuj� di kʰup blak ʔaʔh ɟaɔpʰra. ɟaɔpʰra ʔi mouh gouŋ ʔn, ʔn hɛʔ ʋi duaː naɔh pʰʌm ʔn di ɟaɔ jʌisu. ɟaɔ jʌisu mɤ hɛʔ duaː naɔh pʰʌm ɟaɔpʰra di jʌi dun ʔi. ʔati ʔŋ mouh luk daːk ʔn, pi jaɯ bʌi dʌiaː ti ni. ʔŋ hɛʔ bain tuʔ dun mjo pi dʌm kalak ɟaɔpʰra di duʔi ʔi bjan groh ʔn.
34 kʰoundikʰm ʔadaːʋit ti tu dʌm ho gaːkhraaɔ. ʔn jɛʔ hɛʔ dʌm taɔh, �ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ kalak groh di ʔn ɟaɔ ʔo. ʔn hɛʔ taɔh, �taih mai th kuj� blak ʔaʔh ʔo.
35 taih kɔ ɟm ʔakʰraaɔ pn di ʋain ʔo rnsu mai, taih ʔŋ pi mai ɲaiʔ tuʔ gʌi kʰrɯm plaɔ mai, taih mai ʔɯp gʌi.��
36 kʰo ʔn ti bʌi duʔi ʔisarʌil, taih bʌi dun ʔi np sikʰja pi taɔh ʔo dʌiaː ti ni. ɟaɔ jʌisu ʔi mouh duʔi pi ŋaɔh ʋain bʌi daik ruk kaʋɛʔ, ʔn mouh duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔpʰra taih ʔn kʰjoe duʔi. ɟaɔpʰra mɤ hɛʔ taih ʔn bain daː kaɲa ʔi di ʔɯp kadae.�
37 ʔapʌitaru hɛʔ hoe kalak groh ti, ʔŋ bɔ lɯp kʰaik naɔh gʌi duʔi kɯːn. gʌi ʋi dimu�ʔ ʔapʌitaru bɔ gʌi duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔ jʌisu taɔh, �ʔɯi bʌi binuk jʌi, masʌi pi lo buk jʌi.h�
38 ʔapʌitaru ʋi taɔh, �bʌi dun ʔi lo ʋain naɔh brim bʌi, daɯh naɔh kamae pi duaː ɟaɔpʰra di bʌi. hɛʔ hoe, bʌi lo kʰm di cɯp kʰaik ʔɯm, taih ʔi np, bʌi hɛʔ hɲɯm lɯp ɟaɔ jʌisu, taih ɟaɔ jʌisu gaɔh ʋain hmap bʌi. ʋae ʔn ti ɟaɔ jʌisu di duaː naɔh pʰʌm ɟaɔpʰra bɔ di bʌi.�
39 ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ dʌm duaː kadik sʔɟa luk di duaː ʔn naɔh pʰʌm ʔn, taih ʔŋ lɯp kʰaik naɔh duʔi. kadik sʔɟa ti, ʔn di duaː di dun ʔi. bɔ bʌi, bɔ gun bʌi, bɔ gʌi duʔi ʔi kuj� katuk, gʌi duʔi pi di dɛʔ ɟaɔpʰra, gʌi dun ʔi ɟaɯ ti, gʌi di pʌn pi dʌm kasaiŋ ɟaɔpʰra di duaː.�
40 ʔapʌitaru hɛʔ mano gʌi pae ti. ʔn mɤ kalak groh dun mjo di gʌi, taih ʔŋ kasouh gʌi, taih gʌi taih ɟaɔpʰra kʰjoe bɔ gʌi, taih gʌi lʌih t pʰɯk duʔi ʔi tu mu�ɯm, ʔi kuj� ɟaʔ ni.
41 ʋae ʔn ti gʌi duʔi ʔi hɲɯm groh pi kalak ʔn, bɔ taih ʔŋ lɯp kʰaik naɔh, gʌi dun ʔi ʋi haaɔ taih daː sara cɯp gʌi kʰaik ʔɯm. siŋai ʔn ti, ʔŋ maɯh duʔi kabk ʔoi hraiŋ ʋi, ʔi lɯp kʰaik pʰɯk gʌi duʔi ʔi hɲɯm dup ɟaɔ jʌisu.
42 pʰɯk gʌi duʔi ʔi hɲɯm ɟaɔ jʌisu, gʌi mɤ kuj� rɯm sʌisʌi, tʰum pi mano gʌi duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔ jʌisu, kamuoun luk ʔn ti. gʌi mɤ kabk kʰaːmoun, buk pi dʌm bj ɟaɔ jʌisu gʌi buk. gʌi mɤ kuj� rɯm, sakʰaɯ.
43 gʌi duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔ jʌisu, gʌi mɤ buk na mu�ɯm ʔam kasaɔ ʔi bj kʰɛʔ tak puoun ɟaɔpʰra. gʌi duʔi kɯːn bɔ ʔam bɔ jo kasaɔ pi pae puoun ɟaɔpʰra.
44 gʌi duʔi ʔi hɲɯm ɟaɔ jʌisu, gʌi bain ʔu naɔh, kuj� rɯm.
45 krokram gʌi, gʌi bɔ lae kasak katai gʌi. duk na bɔ man gʌi, gʌi ʋi juk tuʔ, ʋi lae kasak kʰɛʔ pi pʌn gʌi. kʰɛʔ lo dun ʔi, gʌi duaː di ʔn.
46 dun siŋai gʌi mɤ th kaɟou kʰaik ɟʌirup ʔi kuj� kʰaik ʋaik ho ɟaɔpʰra tʌn. hɛʔ hoe, dʌiaː kuj� rɯm gʌi kʰaik kak gʌi, gʌi ʋi kabk kʰaːmoun pi pi dʌm buk bj ɟaɔ jʌisu di gʌi. dʌiaː buk gʌi pae ti dun mjo, naɔh gʌi hɛʔ daːkʰɯi bɔ bain naɔh sɤ, naɔh hman di gʌi.
47 gʌi bɔ ʔɯːp ɟaɔpʰra. dun ʔi kʰaik mɯːk mɤ ʔɯk gʌi. dun siŋai dun siŋai, ɟaɔpʰra mɤ kʰjoe duʔi taih gʌi th hɲɯm lɯp ɟaɔ jʌisu.

��� 3
1 ʔu siŋai ʔapʌitaru gae ʔajɔhan haaɔ lɯp kʰaik ho ɟaɔpʰra. dʌiaː lɯp gae, ʔŋ mouh ʔakʰraaɔ sakʰaɯ gʌi duʔi judaː. ʔŋ mouh ʋae hum ʔoi nari.
2 dʌiaː ʔn ti ʔŋ maɯh duʔi saɔ ʔu ʋi. ʔu siŋ dʌiaː gʌʔ ʔn, plaɔ ʔn hɛʔ jm. dun siŋai gʌi hɛʔ kagoe th ʔn di ʔaiʔ maloh ho ɟaɔpʰra, taih ʔn hmaŋ di gʌi duʔi ʔi th lɯp kʰaik ho ɟaɔpʰra, taih gʌi kaʋʌi ʔn, duaː rʌn di ʔn. maloh duk kuj� ʔn ti, ʔŋ cɤ maloh c�it.
3 duʔi ti, dʌiaː jaɯ ʔn ʔapʌitaru gae ʔajɔhan th lɯp kʰaik ho ɟaɔpʰra, ʔn ʋi hmaŋ, taih gae duaː rʌn di ʔn.
4 ʔapʌitaru gae ʔajɔhan ji joe sikʰja ʔn. ʔapʌitaru ʋi taɔh, �taih mai joe jae.�
5 hɛʔ hoe taɔh pae ti, duʔi saɔ ʋi joe gae. ʔn tʰak gae di duaː rʌn di ʔn.
6 ʔapʌitaru ji taɔh, �rʌn gae kʰriu ʔo tu maɯh. kʰɛʔ pi maɯh ʔo, ʔo ji duaː di mai. ɟaɔ jʌisu, ʔi th mɯːk nasaret, ʔi mouh ʔn ɟaɔ pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔpʰra taih ʔn kʰjoe duʔi, kup gaːaɔ ʔo puoun ɟaɔ jʌisu ti, taih mai jit haaɔ.�
7 ʔn hɛʔ hoe kalak groh ti, ʔn mɤ paː dai ʔaʔh duʔi saɔ ti, cuj� ʔn jit. pn ti plaɔ ʔn bɔ kasuk plaɔ ʔn ʋi maɯh plum ʔu ɟʌiŋ.
8 ʔn bɔ jit haaɔ ʔu ɟʌiŋ. hɛʔ hoe pn ti ʔn ʋi dup ʔapʌitaru haaɔ lɯp kʰaik ho ɟaɔpʰra. ʔn bɔ ʋin di lai bɔ kʰoi. ʔn bɔ ʔɯːp ɟaɔpʰra, kalak luk puoun ɟaɔpʰra.
9 gʌi duʔi kɯːn bɔ jaɯ ʔn haaɔ bɔ ʔɯːp ɟaɔpʰra.
10 gʌi bɔ hloh ʔarɯp ʔn bɔ ʋi np, ʔn mouh duʔi ʔi dʌm kuj� di ʔaiʔ ho ɟaɔpʰra bak maloh c�it tʌn, hmaŋ rʌn di ʔi. pn ti gʌi bɔ ʔam kasaɔ luk ʔn ti.
11 duʔi ti kuj� katʔ ʔapʌitaru gae ʔajɔhan. gʌi duʔi kɯːn mɤ ʔam kasaɔ. gʌi bɔkagljiʔ ʋi th kaɟou kʰaik ɟʌirup tak ʔi cɤ ɟʌirup kʰoundikʰm ʔasalomo.
12 dʌiaː ʋi jaɯ ʔapʌitaru gʌi duʔi kɯːn hɛʔ th, ʔn ʋi kalak groh di gʌi. ʔn taɔh, �bʌi duʔi ʔisarʌil, hmaɔ ʔŋ pae pi ʔam bʌi ʔati.h hmaɔ ʔŋ pae pi joe bʌi di jae.h bʌi tʰak ʔŋ mouh puoun jae bɔ na boe jae ʔi hɛʔ pikain duʔi ti. ʔaaɔ mouh pae ti.
13 ʔŋ mouh ɟaɔpʰra pi krɯp gʌi gouŋ dk ʔʌi ʔi mouh daː ʔabrahm, ʔasaik bɔ ʔakup, ʔn hɛʔ bj ʔapʰouk dkkʰo ɟaɔ jʌisu di bʌi. ɟaɔ jʌisu ji mouh daicʌiŋ ɟaɔpʰra. ɟaɔ jʌisu ti bʌi hɛʔ ʔap di ʔapʰilaʔ tʌn. ʔapʰilaʔ hɛʔ taɔh di blʌih ʔn. bʌi ji taɔh, bʌi tu lo ʔn.
14 bʌi hɛʔ ʋain duʔi ʔi mu�ɯm ʔi siŋaː boe, bʌi hɛʔ ʋi hmaŋ, taih ʔapʰilaʔ blʌih duʔi hae, duʔi ʔi dʌm ŋaɔh ʔasak ʔi.
15 ʋae ʔn ti bʌi hɛʔ ʋi ŋaɔh ʔasak duʔi ti, ʔi mouh ʔn ɟaɔ ʔi np di duaː ʔasak di duʔi dun ʔi. ɟaɔpʰra ji hɛʔ taih ɟaɔ jʌisu ti ʋi jit ʋi ʔim. jae mɤ hɛʔ jaɯ tuʔ luk ʔn ti.
16 duʔi pi jaɯ bʌi ni, bʌi dun ʔi hɛʔ np ʔasʌi ʔn mouh. ʔn hɛʔ hɲɯm ɟaɔ jʌisu maɯh puoun. hɛʔ hoe, ɟaɔ jʌisu hɛʔ pikain ʔn, taih plaɔ ʔn ʋi maɯh plum. ʔŋ mouh puoun ɟaɔ jʌisu bɔ naɔh hɲɯm pi duaː ɟaɔ jʌisu di duʔi ni, ʔŋ hɛʔ taih ʔn kain, taih bʌi dun ʔi pʌn di jaɯ.
17 ʔɯi bʌi binuk ʔo, ʔo hɛʔ np, bɔ bʌi bɔ daː tak bʌi, dʌiaː ʋain bʌi ɟaɔ jʌisu, bʌi tu np ʔasʌi ʔn mouh.
18 pae ti, ɟaɔpʰra ji hɛʔ taih ʔŋ bain tuʔ dun mjo pi dʌm kalak ʔn di duʔi ʔi bjan groh ɟaɔpʰra. ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ dʌm kalak di gʌi dun ʔi luk duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔpʰra taih ʔn kʰjoe duʔi. ʔn lo kʰm douk bain mjo bain mjo.
19 kʰo ʔn ti dʌiaː ti ni, bʌi lo ʋain naɔh brim bʌi, daɯh naɔh kamae pi duaː ɟaɔpʰra di bʌi, taih ɟaɔpʰra gaɔh ʋain hmap bʌi, taih ʔn ʋi duaː ʔakʰraaɔ di maɯh bʌi naɔh daːkʰɯi.
20 hɛʔ hoe, taih duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔpʰra th di bʌi, taih ʔn kʰjoe bɔ bʌi. duʔi ti hɛʔ mouh ɟaɔ jʌisu, ʋi pi c�ou ɟaɔpʰra taih ʔn kʰjoe bʌi.
21 dʌiaː ti ni, ɟaɔ jʌisu kuj� kʰaik mɯːk gaːkhraaɔ, taih ʔŋ kɔ ɟm ʔakʰraaɔ di ʔmprae ɟaɔpʰra taih dun mjo ʋi sikʰja pi brim, pi dʌiaː mʌn. pae ti, ʔŋ di bain pi pi dʌm kalak ɟaɔpʰra di duʔi ʔi bjan groh ʔn kʰaː ʔaiʔ dʌiaː hɛʔ hlʌiŋ kasaɔ.
22 daː sara ʔamosai tʌn mɤ hɛʔ dʌm taɔh, �ɟaɔpʰra ʔi mouh ɟaɔpʰra pi krɯp bʌi, ʔn di ʋi tɯi duʔi ʔi bjan groh ɟaɔpʰra ʔu ʋi di bʌi. ʔn di bain pi ʔo. ʔn di th katai bʌi bɔ mouh duʔi ʔamjo bʌi. bʌi lo tʰum tuʔ groh pi kalak ʔn di bʌi dun mjo.
23 ʔasʌi ji tu tʰum dup groh pi kalak ʔn, ʔo di ʋain ʔn, kɔe hu taih ʔn kuj� katai duʔi ʔamjo ʔn.�
24 ʔu siŋ dʌiaː kuj� ʔasamuʔʌin tʌn, gʌi duʔi ʔi bjan groh ɟaɔpʰra dun ʔi, gʌi mɤ hɛʔ kalak luk ʔakʰraaɔ ti ʔi hɛʔ ɟm dʌiaː ti ni.
25 groh pi kalak ɟaɔpʰra di gʌi daː tak bʌi dʌiaː mʌn, ʔŋ mouh groh pi kalak ɟaɔpʰra bɔ di bʌi dʌiaː ti ni. bɔ kadik sʔɟa pi dʌm duaː ɟaɔpʰra di gouŋ dk bʌi, ʔŋ mouh kadik sʔɟa pi duaː ɟaɔpʰra bɔ di bʌi. ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ dʌm kalak groh di daː ʔabrahm tʌn. ʔn hɛʔ taɔh, �ʔŋ di maɯh hloukhlan mai ʔu ʋi, ʔn di mukkara taih di duʔi dun mjo daik kadae.�
26 dʌiaː tɯi ɟaɔpʰra gun ʔn, taih ʔn th ɟm daik kadae ni, ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ taih ʔn ɟm duk kuj� bʌi di ʔaiʔ, taih ʔn mukkara duaː di bʌi, taih bʌi dun ʔi bɔ ʋain na tu mu�ɯm pi buk bʌi.� kʰɛʔ ti ʔapʌitaru kalak groh di gʌi duʔi kɯːn ʔi kuj� kʰaik ho ɟaɔpʰra.

��� 4
1 ʔapʌitaru gae ʔajɔhan, dʌiaː kalak gae groh di duʔi kɯːn, ʔŋ maɯh gʌi duʔi ʔi hlu di ɟaɔpʰra bɔ duʔi ʔi ʔɯp gʌi duʔi ʔi b�ou ho ɟaɔpʰra bɔ gʌi duʔi kʰaik pʰɯk sadukʰai mk ʔi, gʌi hɛʔ th duk kuj� ʔapʌitaru gae ʔajɔhan tʌn.
2 gʌi hɛʔ ru kasaɔ di gae. gʌi tu ʔɯk groh pi kalak gae di duʔi kɯːn luk ɟaɔ jʌisu hɛʔ ʋi jit ʋi ʔim.
3 kʰo ʔn ti gʌi ʋi hmet gae, kʰruk gae kʰaik kapɯm. kup hɛʔ ram ʔp, gʌi taih gae kuj� hnaɔ kʰaik kapɯm, taih ʔŋ ɟm paː kʰaihɲa.
4 ʔŋ ji maɯh duʔi kɯːn, gʌi hɛʔ hoe tʰum groh pi kalak gae, gʌi ʋi hɲɯm kʰaik naɔh. gʌi duʔi hɲɯm ti, gʌi ʔimae hɛʔ mouh kabk pʰn hraiŋ ʋi.
5 paː kʰaihɲa, gʌi duʔi ʔɯp ʔɯːk judaː bɔ gʌi daː tak bɔ gʌi daː sara ʔi mano daːra judaː, gʌi hɛʔ th kaɟou kʰaik mɯːk jʌirusalaim.
6 bɔ daː tak ʔi ʔɯp tuʔ duʔi ʔi hlu di ɟaɔpʰra, ʔi cɤ ʔanaʔ, bɔ ʔakaepʰa gʌi ʔajɔhan, ʔalʌisndaː, bɔ gʌi ʔi mouh hloukhlan daː tak ʔi ʔɯp tuʔ duʔi ʔi hlu di ɟaɔpʰra, gʌi bɔkagljiʔ hɛʔ th kaɟou.
7 gʌi hɛʔ ʋi dɛʔ ʔapʌitaru gae ʔajɔhan, taih gae th ɟm di ʔaiʔ gʌi. gʌi ʋi dimu�ʔ gae taɔh, �ʔasʌi hɛʔ taih bae buk ɟaɯ ti.h puoun ʔasʌi bae hɛʔ daɯh buk ɟaɯ ti.h�
8 pn ti naɔh pʰʌm ɟaɔpʰra kɔ no kʰaik naɔh ʔapʌitaru. hɛʔ hoe, ʔn ʋi ʋji groh gʌi ti. ʔn taɔh di gʌi, �ʔɯi bʌi duʔi ʔi ʔɯp mɯːk bɔ bʌi daː tak kʰaik mɯːk ʔisarʌil,
9 ʔataɯ bʌi hɛʔ taɔh di dimu�ʔ jae luk pɛʔ hɛʔ cuj� jae di duʔi saɔ tʌn. bʌi hɛʔ taɔh, bʌi si np, hmaɔ jae hɛʔ pae di pikain ʔn.
10 kʰo ʔn ti ʔo di ʋi kalak, taih bɔ bʌi bɔ gʌi duʔi ʔisarʌil dun ʔi np sikʰja, ʔŋ hɛʔ mouh puoun ɟaɔ jʌisu ʔi hɛʔ taih duʔi ti ʋi kain, taih ʔn pʌn di kuj� di ʔaiʔ bʌi dʌiaː ti ni. ɟaɔ jʌisu ti mouh duʔi th mɯːk nasaret. bʌi mɤ hɛʔ ŋaɔh ʋain ʔn, buk taih ʔn jm daik ruk kaʋɛʔ. hɛʔ hoe, ʋae jm ʔn, ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ taih ʔn ʋi jit ʋi ʔim. ɟaɔ jʌisu ti hɛʔ taih duʔi saɔ ni ʋi kain.
11 luk ɟaɔ jʌisu ti hɛʔ dʌm kalak kʰaik bp ɟaɔpʰra taɔh, �ʔn pi maaɔ ʔu buk. gʌi duʔi sm kak hɛʔ ʋain maaɔ ti. ɟaɔpʰra jɛʔ hɛʔ ʋi daɯh maaɔ ti, buk taih ʔn bain cʌiŋ ruk.�
12 ʔŋ bɔ pae ti. ʔŋ maɯh mi ɟaɔ jʌisu ʔu kadk ʔi pai di kʰjoe duʔi. ʔaaɔ maɯh ʔasʌi daik kadae ʔi pai di kʰjoe duʔi.�
13 dʌiaː kalak ʔapʌitaru groh ti, gʌi daː tak ʋi jaɯ, bɔ ʔn bɔ ʔajɔhan hɛʔ j di kalak groh sɤ di gʌi. gʌi bɔ ʔam kasaɔ. gʌi ji np, duʔi gae ti tu dʌm hʌin pɛʔ kʰaik ɟuk. gae mouh duʔi tu np masʌi. gae ji j di kalak groh di gʌi. gʌi ji ʋi hloh, gae hɛʔ dʌm kuj� rɯm dup ʔajʌisu tʌn.
14 kup jaɯ gʌi duʔi pɛʔ hɛʔ pikain ʔapʌitaru gae ʔajɔhan hɛʔ kuj� rɯm dup gae, gʌi tu pʌn kalak taɔh, ʔaaɔ hman, ʔn tu kain.
15 pn ti gʌi daː tak ʋi c�ou ʔapʌitaru gae ʔajɔhan, taih gae lʌih t duk kuj� gʌi. hɛʔ hoe, gʌi ʋi lae skkʰjak luk ʔn ti.
16 gʌi taɔh, �masʌi pi lo buk ʔʌi di duʔi ʔa ʋi ni.h gʌi dun ʔi, ʔi kuj� mɯːk jʌirusalaim, gʌi mɤ hɛʔ np luk gae hɛʔ buk na mu�ɯm ʔam kasaɔ. ʔʌi mɤ tu pʌn kalak taɔh, ʔaaɔ hman, ʔaaɔ mouh.
17 ʔʌi ji tu si taih gʌi duʔi ʔisarʌil dun ʔi np luk ʔn ti. kʰo, ʔʌi lo kalak groh kabjo di gae, taih gae ʋi maɯh naɔh jo. pʌiaː ʔu cɯp, kɔe hu taih gae gaːaɔ puoun ʔajʌisu ti, ʋi kalak di ʔi haɔ.�
18 gʌi hɛʔ hoe kalak pae ti, gʌi ʋi dɛʔ ʔapʌitaru gae ʔajɔhan, taih gae ʋi th duk kuj� gʌi. gʌi ʋi c�ou gae, kɔe hu taih gae ʋi daɯh puoun ʔajʌisu ti, ʋi kalak di ʔi haɔ, kɔe hu taih gae ʋi mano masʌi luk ʔajʌisu ti.
19 ʔapʌitaru gae ʔajɔhan ji ʋi taɔh, �bʌi lo ɟʌiŋɟa rak bʌi, sʌi jae ʋain groh ɟaɔpʰra, ʋi tʰum dup groh bʌi. ʔŋ hman, tu hman.
20 ʔi mouh jae, jae tu pʌn kuj� pijʌiŋ, tu pʌn kuj� situk tu groh. kʰɛʔ pi jaɯ ŋae jae, kʰɛʔ pi tʰum hjo jae, jae lo ʋi kalak, taih ʔi np.�
21 gae hɛʔ hoe kalak pae ti, gʌi daː tak ʋi kalak groh mu�ɯm jo di gae. hɛʔ hoe gʌi ʋi taih gae lʌih haaɔ duk kuj� gʌi. gʌi ji tu np hmaɔ di pae di dm hmap di gae. kup ʋi ʔɯːp gʌi duʔi kɯːn ɟaɔpʰra luk pɛʔ hɛʔ buk gae, gʌi daː tak tu ʋi j buk masʌi di gae.
22 duʔi ʔi hɛʔ kain tʌn, ʔasak ʔn hɛʔ no pʰuoun gaɯ loi.
23 gʌi hɛʔ hoe blʌih ʔapʌitaru gae ʔajɔhan, taih gae ʋʌiŋ duk kuj� gae. gae mɤ haaɔ sɤ di duʔi kʰaik pʰɯk gae. gae ʋi kʰai tuʔ dun mjo pi kalak gʌi daː tak ʔi ʔɯp mɯːk bɔ gʌi daː tak ʔi jaiʔ gʌi duʔi ʔi hlu di ɟaɔpʰra.
24 gʌi duʔi kʰaik pʰɯk ɟaɔ jʌisu gʌi hɛʔ hoe tʰum groh pi kʰai gae, gʌi ʋi bain ʔu naɔh, ʋi couh di sakʰaɯ, kalak groh di ɟaɔpʰra. gʌi taɔh, �ʔɯi mai ɟaɔpʰra, mai mouh ɟaɔpʰra ʔi ʔɯp tuʔ. mai mɤ hɛʔ pʰan blʌih bɔ gaːkhraaɔ bɔ kadae. mai hɛʔ pʰan blʌih bɔ ʔɯm nmmouksara. kʰɛʔ bɔ maɯh ʔi kuj� daik kadae ni, mai ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ buk tuʔ.
25 mai mɤ hɛʔ dʌm duaː naɔh pʰʌm mai di kʰoundikʰm ʔadaːʋit ʔi mouh daicʌiŋ mai. ʔn bɔ mouh gouŋ dk jʌi. mai hɛʔ taih ʔn taɔh, �hmaɔ ʔŋ pae pi ru kasaɔ gʌi duʔi ʔamjo haɔ.h hmaɔ ʔŋ pae pi lae skkʰjak gʌi na tu mu�ɯm ʔi tu maɯh dikʰo.h
26 gʌi kʰoundikʰm daik kadae hɛʔ th, bɔ gʌi daː kaɲa ʔi ʔɯp kadae ni, gʌi hɛʔ kaɟou, taih gʌi kagoh di ɟaɔpʰra, taih gʌi kagoh bɔ di duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔpʰra taih ʔn kʰjoe duʔi.�
27 dʌiaː ti ni, ʔŋ hɛʔ ʋi bain pae ti. kʰoundikʰm ʔahʌiruʔ bɔ ʔapʰuntʰi pʰilaʔ, bɔ gʌi duʔi ʔamjo haɔ, bɔ gʌi duʔi ʔisarʌil kʰaik mɯːk ni, gʌi hɛʔ th kaɟou, taih gʌi buk na tu mu�ɯm di ɟaɔ jʌisu, ʔi mouh daicʌiŋ mai, ʔi hɛʔ boe kasaɔ, ʋi pi raɔh mai taih ʔn kʰjoe duʔi.
28 pɛʔ hɛʔ buk gʌi, ʔŋ pi pi dʌm kalak mai kʰaː ʔaiʔ pi dʌm kʰʋaːk mai ɟaɔpʰra taih ʔŋ bain.
29 dʌiaː ti ni, mai ɟaɔpʰra, taih mai ʋi joe kʰɛʔ pi buk gʌi, mai ʋi tʰum groh kabjo gʌi. jʌi daicʌiŋ mai, jʌi hmaŋ di mai ɟaɔpʰra, taih mai ʋi duaː jʌi maɯh naɔh j di ʋi kalak groh mai di duʔi haɔ. kɔe taih jʌi maɯh naɔh jo.
30 taih mai ɟaɔpʰra mɤ bj puoun mai, taih duʔi saɔ ʋi kain, taih jʌi pʌn di daɯh puoun ɟaɔ jʌisu, buk na mu�ɯm ʔam bain mjo bain mjo, taih ʔi np luk ɟaɔ jʌisu ʔi mouh daicʌiŋ boe pi tɯi mai.�
31 dʌiaː hmaŋ gʌi pae ti, duk kuj� gʌi tʌn, ʔŋ bɔ dijʌiŋ ʔu ɟʌiŋ. naɔh pʰʌm ɟaɔpʰra mɤ th lɯp no kʰaik naɔh gʌi dun ʔi. gʌi ʋi couh di kalak groh ɟaɔpʰra, ʔaaɔ hu maɯh naɔh jo masʌi.
32 gʌi duʔi ʔi hɲɯm ɟaɔ jʌisu, gʌi bɔkagljiʔ kuj� rɯm. gʌi bain ʔu naɔh. kʰɛʔ maɯh gʌi krokram, gʌi ʋi lae kasak di gʌi dun ʔi. ʔŋ mɤ tu maɯh ʔasʌi ʔi maʔ ʔŋ mouh krokram do brim ʔn.
33 gʌi duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔ jʌisu, gʌi mɤ kalak groh ʔi maɯh puoun tak di duʔi haɔ. gʌi kalak kʰɛʔ pi dʌm jaɯ gʌi luk ɟaɔ jʌisu hɛʔ ʋi jit ʋi ʔim. ɟaɔpʰra mɤ kaʋʌi gʌi, cuj� gʌi dun ʔi.
34 katai gʌi duʔi ʔi hɲɯm ɟaɔ jʌisu, ʔaaɔ maɯh duʔi gin. ʔasʌi maɯh kak bɔ man, ʔn juk tuʔ.
35 kʰɛʔ pʌn ʔn rʌn, ʔn ʋi duaː di duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔ jʌisu, taih gʌi ʋi kasak kʰɛʔ pi lo dun ʔi.
36 ʔŋ bɔ maɯh ʔajosaip, gʌi duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔ jʌisu, gʌi mɤ taih ʔn cɤ bɔ ʔabanab. �sipʰaɔ cɤ ti, ʔŋ mouh �gun ʔi np di hlaɔ naɔh ʔi haɔ��. duʔi ti, ʔn mouh kʰraɯ ʔalʌiʋi ʔu ʋi. mɯːk brim ʔn mouh goun ʔɯm ʔi cɤ kʰupʰro.
37 bɔ ʔn juk man ʔn, duaː rʌn pi pʌn ʔn di duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔ jʌisu.

��� 5
1 ʔŋ ʋi maɯh duʔi ʔu ʋi, ʔn cɤ ʔanani. ʔibɯŋ ʔn cɤ nak sapʰira. duʔi ʋi ti mɤ ʋi juk man ʔn ʔu plo. kʰɛʔ pʌn ʔn rʌn, ʔn ʋi ʔoun mk kalaɔ ʔadaː ʔn.
2 ʔibɯŋ ʔn mɤ np tuʔ luk ʔn ti. hɛʔ hoe, ʔn ʋi daɯh rʌn ʔi kaloi, ʋi duaː di duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔ jʌisu.
3 ʔapʌitaru ʋi taɔh, �ʔɯi, ʔanani, hmaɔ ʔŋ pae pi kʰʋaːk mai bo kanm ʔi cɤ satan pʌn di lɯp kʰaik naɔh mai, taih mai kalo di naɔh pʰʌm ɟaɔpʰra.h mai hɛʔ hoe daɯh ʔoun rʌn pi pʌn mai, ji taɔh, mai hɛʔ duaː tuʔ.
4 ʔaiʔ juk mai man ti, ʔŋ mouh kro mai. mai hɛʔ hoe juk, rʌn pi pʌn mai, ʔŋ bɔ mouh rʌn mai. mai s duaː tuʔ hɛʔ pʌn. hmaɔ ʔŋ pae pi kalo mai pae ti.h mai tu kalo duʔi. mai hɛʔ kalo ɟaɔpʰra.�
5 dʌiaː jaɯ ʔanani groh ti, ʔn ʋi kʌih jm ʔu ɟʌiŋ. pn ti gʌi duʔi ʔi jaɯ luk ʔn ti, gʌi dun ʔi ʋi jo kasaɔ.
6 gʌi kaɲum ʔi kuj� duk kuj� gʌi ti, gʌi ʋi th, kabn do buk ʔn kʰaik bik, ʋi kagoe haaɔ dip ʔn.
7 ʋae ʔn ti bɔ no ʔoi nari, ʔibɯŋ ʔanani ʋi th lɯp duk kuj� gʌi. ʔn hɲm np luk ʔimae ʔn hɛʔ jm.
8 ʔapʌitaru ʋi dimu�ʔ ʔn taɔh, �taih mai kalak groh hman di ʔo. dʌiaː juk bae man bae, ʔŋ hman, bae hɛʔ pʌn rʌn kʰɛʔ pi duaː bae di ni.h� nak sapʰira ʋi taɔh, �hɛʔ mouh, hɛʔ hman. jae hɛʔ pʌn kʰɛʔ ti.�
9 pn ti ʔapʌitaru ʋi taɔh di ʔn, �hmaɔ ʔŋ pae pi lae pʰrum bae di tʰʌiaɔ naɔh pʰʌm ɟaɔpʰra.h taih mai joe. gʌi duʔi ʔi hɛʔ hoe dip do buk ʔimae mai, gʌi hɛʔ hoe ʋi th ɟm di ʔaiʔ maloh. gʌi di ʋi haaɔ dip bɔ do buk mai dʌiaː ti ni.�
10 ʔapʌitaru hɛʔ hoe kalak groh ti, nak sapʰira tʌn ʋi kʌih jm di ʔaiʔ ʔn ʔu ɟʌiŋ. pn ti gʌi kaɲum ʋi th lɯp duk kuj� gʌi ti. dʌiaː jaɯ gʌi bɔ nak sapʰira hɛʔ hoe jm, gʌi ʋi kagoe lʌih ʔn duk ti, ʋi haaɔ dip do buk ʔn kʰup ʔimae ʔn.
11 gʌi duʔi ʔi lɯp pʰɯk ɟaɔ jʌisu, gʌi dun ʔi ʔi np luk ʔn ti bɔ jo kasaɔ.
12 gʌi duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔ jʌisu, gʌi buk na mu�ɯm ʔam kasaɔ katai gʌi duʔi kɯːn, taih gʌi bɔkagljiʔ jaɯ puoun ɟaɔpʰra. gʌi duʔi hɲɯm ɟaɔ jʌisu, gʌi th kaɟou kʰaik ɟʌirup tak ʔi kuj� kʰaik ʋaik ho ɟaɔpʰra ʔi cɤ ɟʌirup kʰoundikʰm ʔasalomo. gʌi mɤ bain ʔu naɔh.
13 gʌi duʔi haɔ tu j th lɯp kʰaik pʰɯk ɟaɔ jʌisu. gʌi ji rosʌi gʌi duʔi ʔi hɲɯm ɟaɔ jʌisu.
14 pi bɔ hɛʔ pae ti mɤ, gʌi duʔi hɲɯm sikʰja ɟaɔ jʌisu ji krai di kɯːn. bɔ maɯh bɔ ʔimae bɔ ʔibɯŋ, gʌi kɯːn ʋi ha lɯp kʰaik pʰɯk gʌi duʔi hɲɯm ɟaɔ jʌisu.
15 gʌi duʔi kɯːn ʋi daɯh lʌih duʔi saɔ kʰaik kak, ʋi haaɔ blʌih gʌi kʰup ʔŋtʌiŋ daik kac�uk ʔit gʌi bɔ daik ʔmbʌiaɔ, taih gʌi hnaɔ ʔapʌitaru th, taih kamɯk ʔn ʋi jap duʔi saɔ gʌi ti.
16 bɔ maɯh gʌi duʔi kɯːn ʔi kuj� katʔ mɯːk jʌirusalaim, gʌi th tɯi duʔi saɔ bɔ gʌi duʔi maɯh kanm hae kuj� kʰaik do buk gʌi. gʌi mɤ hɛʔ kain dun ʔi.
17 daː tak ʔi ʔɯp tuʔ duʔi ʔi hlu di ɟaɔpʰra bɔ gʌi duʔi dup ʔn bɔ gʌi duʔi ʔi mouh pʰɯk sadukʰai, gʌi ji tu ʔɯk na mu�ɯm ʔam kasaɔ pi buk gʌi duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔ jʌisu.
18 gʌi ʋi hmet gʌi duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔ jʌisu, kʰruk gʌi kʰaik kapɯm.
19 kʰaik hmaɯ ʔŋ ji maɯh ʔamu ʔamaʔ ɟaɔpʰra ʔu kadk th, ʋaɯh maloh kʰaik kapɯm, taih gʌi lʌih.
20 ʔn ʋi taɔh di gʌi, �taih bʌi haaɔ kʰaik ho ɟaɔpʰra, kalak taih gʌi tʰum tuʔ dun mjo luk pi di pae gʌi di pʌn ʔasak kamae.�
21 ʋae ʔn ti siŋʋh cʌiaɔ gʌi ʋi tʰum buk pi c�ou ʔamu ʔamaʔ ɟaɔpʰra gʌi buk. gʌi ʋi haaɔ lɯp kʰaik ʋaik ho ɟaɔpʰra, mano gʌi duʔi kɯːn. ʋae ʔn ti daː tak ʔi ʔɯp tuʔ duʔi ʔi hlu di ɟaɔpʰra bɔ gʌi duʔi ʔi dup ʔn, gʌi ʋi th kaɟou duk kuj� gʌi daː tak. gʌi ʋi dɛʔ gʌi duʔi ʔi soukpʰjaʔ ʔamu ʔi bɔ gʌi daː tak kʰaik mɯːk ʔisarʌil, taih gʌi dun ʔi th. gʌi bɔ c�ou daːlam gʌi mk ʔi, taih gʌi haaɔ dɛʔ duʔi pi hmet gʌi tʌn.
22 dʌiaː th ɟm gʌi kʰaik kapɯm, gʌi tu jaɯ duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔ jʌisu gʌi tʌn. ʔaaɔ hu maɯh. pn ti gʌi ʋi ʋʌiŋ duk kuj� gʌi daː tak tʌn, kalak tuʔ di gʌi luk ʔn ti.
23 gʌi taɔh, �jʌi hɛʔ th ɟm kʰaik kapɯm. maloh si kabit sikʰja. gʌi duʔi b�ou maloh, gʌi mɤ kuj� sikʰja na ʔaiʔ maloh. jʌi ʋi haaɔ ʋaɯh maloh, ʔaaɔ hu jaɯ ʔasʌi kuj� na kʰaik.�
24 dʌiaː jaɯ gʌi luk ʔn ti, bɔ daː tak ʔi jaiʔ gʌi duʔi ʔi hlu di ɟaɔpʰra bɔ duʔi ʔi ʔɯp gʌi ʔi b�ou ho ɟaɔpʰra, gʌi dun ʔi tu np di buk masʌi. gʌi bɔ jo, tu np, hmaɔ ʔŋ pae ʔŋ bain pae ti.
25 dʌiaː ʔn ti ʔŋ ʋi maɯh duʔi ʔu ʋi, ʔn th taɔh, �gʌi duʔi pi kʰruk bʌi kʰaik kapɯm, gʌi ʋi kuj� kʰaik ʋaik ho ɟaɔpʰra, mano gʌi duʔi kɯːn.�
26 pn ti duʔi ʔi ʔɯp gʌi ʔi b�ou ho ɟaɔpʰra bɔ gʌi duʔi ʔi cuj� ʔn, gʌi ʋi haaɔ dɛʔ gʌi duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔ jʌisu th ɟm duk kuj� daː tak gʌi tʌn. gʌi ji tu j kacu�a duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔ jʌisu gʌi ti. gʌi jo duʔi kɯːn di daɯh maaɔ ʋɯŋ di gʌi.
27 gʌi duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔ jʌisu gʌi tʌn, gʌi hɛʔ hoe th ɟm di ʔaiʔ gʌi daː tak kʰaik mɯːk, ʔŋ mouh daː tak ʔi ʔɯp tuʔ duʔi ʔi hlu di ɟaɔpʰra, ʔn ʋi dimu�ʔ gʌi.
28 ʔn taɔh, �jʌi hɛʔ hoe dm bʌi, kɔe taih bʌi mano duʔi haɔ luk ʔajʌisu tʌn. bʌi ji hɛʔ hoe kalak taih mɯːk jʌirusalaim bɔ mɯːk np luk ʔn ti. bʌi mɤ taɔh ʔŋ mouh hmap jʌi, jʌi hɛʔ ŋaɔh ʋain ʔn.�
29 ʔapʌitaru bɔ gʌi duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔ jʌisu, gʌi ʋi ʋji groh ti. gʌi taɔh, �jʌi lo tʰum groh ɟaɔpʰra ʔaiʔ tʰum groh duʔi.
30 bʌi hɛʔ ŋaɔh ʋain ɟaɔ jʌisu daik ruk kaʋɛʔ. ɟaɔpʰra pi krɯp gʌi gouŋ dk ʔʌi kʰaː ʔaiʔ ʔn ji hɛʔ taih ɟaɔ jʌisu ʋi jit ʋi ʔim, taih ɟaɔ jʌisu ʋi ho kuj� blak ʔaʔh ʔn.
31 ʔn mɤ hɛʔ taih ɟaɔ jʌisu bain daː kaɲa ʔi ʔɯp kadae. ʔn bɔ bain ɟaɔ ʔi kʰjoe duʔi. ɟaɔ jʌisu ti bɔ np di taih bʌi ʋain naɔh brim bʌi, daɯh naɔh kamae pi duaː ʔn. ʔn np bɔ di gaɔh ʋain hmap bʌi duʔi ʔisarʌil.
32 jʌi mɤ hɛʔ jaɯ tuʔ luk ʔn ti, jʌi kɔ np di kalak. naɔh pʰʌm ɟaɔpʰra mɤ np di kalak, taih ʔŋ kahlouh di naɔh bʌi. ɟaɔpʰra ji di taih naɔh pʰʌm ʔn lɯp kuj� kʰaik naɔh dun ʔi ʔi tʰum dup ʔn.�
33 dʌiaː jaɯ gʌi daː tak groh ti, gʌi bɔ ru kasaɔ, si ŋaɔh ʋain gʌi.
34 ʔŋ ji maɯh duʔi kʰaik pʰɯk pʰarisai ʔu ʋi, ʔn cɤ ʔagaːmalʌin. ʔn mouh daː sara ʔi mano daːra ɟaɔpʰra. gʌi duʔi bɔkagljiʔ, gʌi bɔ rosʌi ʔn. dʌiaː lae skkʰjak gʌi daː tak pae ti, ʔagaːmalʌin tʌn ʋi jit hmaŋ, taih gʌi c�ou duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔ jʌisu lʌih duk kuj� gʌi ʔu kacn.
35 hɛʔ hoe, ʔn ʋi kalak di gʌi daː tak. ʔn taɔh, �ʔɯi, bʌi daː tak kʰaik mɯːk ʔisarʌil, taih bʌi ɟʌiŋɟa sikʰja pi di buk bʌi di gʌi duʔi ti.
36 kʰaː ʔaiʔ ʔŋ hɲm hlʌiŋ, ʔŋ maɯh duʔi ʔu ʋi, ʔn cɤ ʔatʰʌidaː. ʔn hɛʔ taɔh, ʔn mouh duʔi tak. ʔn mɤ dɛʔ duʔi dup ʔn, taih gʌi kagoh di duʔi roma. ʔŋ mɤ maɯh duʔi kabk pʰuoun majaɔh ʋi, ʔi th dup ʔn. gʌi ji ŋaɔh ʔasak ʔn. hɛʔ hoe, bɔ gʌi duʔi ʔi dup ʔn hɛʔ kajaɔh, ʔaaɔ hu maɯh.
37 ʋae ʔn ti ʔŋ maɯh ʔajudʔ tʌn, ʔi th ʔɯːk gaːlilʌi. ʔn hɛʔ th dʌiaː daɯh daː kaɲa roma ɟarak, daim ʔoun cɤ dun ʔi kʰaik mɯːk. ʔn mɤ dɛʔ duʔi dup ʔn. gʌi hɛʔ ŋaɔh bɔ ʔn. bɔ gʌi duʔi ʔi dup ʔn hɛʔ kajaɔh, ʔaaɔ hu maɯh.
38 kʰo ʔn ti dʌiaː ti ni, ʔo taɔh di bʌi, kɔe buk masʌi di duʔi gʌi ti. taih bʌi blʌih gʌi, taih gʌi haaɔ, buk pi ʔɯk gʌi. pi buk gʌi, sʌi ʔŋ mouh ʔaŋjan duʔi, ʔŋ di c�ɯm.
39 sʌi ʔŋ ji mouh puoun ɟaɔpʰra, taih gʌi buk pae ti, bʌi tu pai di buk masʌi, taih gʌi c�ɯm. bʌi ji lo sadik, kɔe taih bʌi kagoh di ɟaɔpʰra.�
40 ʔn hɛʔ hoe kalak groh ti, gʌi daː tak tʌn ʋi lae pʰrum luk ʔn ti. gʌi ʋi dɛʔ gʌi duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔ jʌisu ʋi th lɯp duk kuj� gʌi bɔ mh gʌi dun ʔi. hɛʔ hoe, daː tak gʌi ti ʋi dm gʌi, kɔe taih gʌi kalak groh luk ɟaɔ jʌisu. ʋae ʔn ti daː tak gʌi tʌn bɔ ʋi blʌih, taih gʌi haaɔ.
41 gʌi duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔ jʌisu, gʌi ʋi lʌih duk kuj� gʌi daː tak ʔi ʔɯp mɯːk. naɔh gʌi ʋi daːkʰɯi kasaɔ. gʌi taɔh, ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ kʰʋaːk, taih gʌi pʌn di kʰm douk kup hɲɯm gʌi ɟaɔ jʌisu.
42 ʋae ʔn ti dun siŋai, dun siŋai, gʌi ʋi haaɔ lɯp kʰaik ʋaik ho ɟaɔpʰra, gʌi bɔ haaɔ lɯp kʰaik kak ʔi, ʋi kalak luk ɟaɔ jʌisu. gʌi kalak sʌisʌi taih dun ʔi kɔ np luk ɟaɔ jʌisu mouh duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔpʰra taih ʔn kʰjoe duʔi.

��� 6
1 ʋae ʔn ti gʌi dibai ɟaɔ jʌisu mɤ hɛʔ krai di kɯːn kasaɔ. ʔŋ ji maɯh duʔi judaː ʔi kalak groh grik mk ʔi bɔ gʌi duʔi judaː ʔi kalak groh haibrai mk ʔi, gʌi tu lae pʰrum. gʌi duʔi th mɯːk grik, gʌi taɔh, �dun siŋai, dʌiaː kasak gʌi pi di hum, ja siprh jʌi, gʌi tu pʌn kʰɛʔ pi lo gʌi.�
2 pn ti gʌi dibai ɟaɔ jʌisu gaɯ di ʔa ʋi, gʌi ʋi dɛʔ gʌi dibai ɟaɔ jʌisu dun ʔi th kaɟou. gʌi ʋi taɔh, �sʌi jʌi kasak pi di hum, jʌi ʔaaɔ hu ʋi dn mano daːra ɟaɔpʰra. ʔati ʔaaɔ mu�ɯm, ʔaaɔ sikʰja.
3 kʰo ʔn ti taih bʌi binuk raɔh duʔi katai bʌi bu ʋi. taih ʔŋ mouh duʔi ʔi maɯh ʔaŋjan, ʔi maɯh naɔh pʰʌm ɟaɔpʰra no kʰaik naɔh gʌi. sʌi duʔi haɔ mɤ taɔh, gʌi mouh duʔi mu�ɯm, taih bʌi raɔh duʔi ɟaɯ ti bu ʋi, taih jʌi ʋi c�ou gʌi kasak pi di hum di dun ʔi.
4 sʌi ʔŋ pae ti, jʌi di bɔ dn di sakʰaɯ di ɟaɔpʰra bɔ ho daːra ɟaɔpʰra sʌisʌi, ʔaaɔ hu lo buk bain mjo bain mjo.�
5 gʌi hɛʔ hoe kalak groh ti, gʌi duʔi kʰaik pʰɯk ɟaɔ jʌisu, gʌi dun ʔi ʔɯk groh ti. gʌi ʋi raɔh ʔasatʰʌipʰan. naɔh pʰʌm ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ no kʰaik naɔh ʔn. ʔn mɤ hɲɯm sikʰja. gʌi bɔ raɔh ʔapʰilip, ʔapʰrokʰoru, ʔanikʰaːno, ʔatʰimun, ʔapʰamʌin bɔ ʔanikʰola, ʔi th mɯːk ʔntʰiʔo, ʔi hɛʔ lɯp duʔi judaː.
6 gʌi hɛʔ hoe raɔh duʔi bu ʋi ti, gʌi ʋi taih gʌi duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔ jʌisu ʋi sakʰaɯ ɟaɔpʰra bɔ daːk dai daik giŋ gʌi bu ʋi ti, taih ɟaɔpʰra mukkara duaː di gʌi.
7 pn ti gʌi duʔi ʔi kuj� kʰaik mɯːk jʌirusalaim, gʌi kɯːn bɔ pʌn di tʰum groh ɟaɔpʰra, taih gʌi duʔi hɲɯm ɟaɔ jʌisu ʋai kɯːn kapuaː. gʌi duʔi ʔi hlu di ɟaɔpʰra mɤ, gʌi kɯːn ʋi hɲɯm ɟaɔ jʌisu, ʋi dup daːra pi mano gʌi luk ɟaɔ jʌisu.
8 ʔŋ ji maɯh ʔasatʰʌipʰan tʌn, ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ kaʋʌi hɛʔ cuj� kɯːn ʔn bɔ taih ʔn maɯh puoun ɟaɔpʰra. ʔn buk na mu�ɯm ʔam kasaɔ bain mjo bain mjo.
9 gʌi duʔi ʔi kuj� kʰaik ɟuk judaː mk ʔi, gʌi tu ʔɯk ʔn. bɔ duʔi kʰaik pʰɯk duʔi tʰkhak,�gʌi krɯp kʰaik ɟuk ti. gʌi duʔi ɟaɯ ti, bɔ gʌi duʔi ʔi th mɯːk kurʌiŋ gae mɯːk ʔalʌisndaːrʌin bɔ gʌi ʔi th ʔɯːk kʰilikʰi gae ʔɯːk ʔasija, gʌi bɔ haaɔ duk kuj� ʔasatʰʌipʰan. gʌi bɔ kalak groh ʔi lae kabh di ʔn.
10 ʔn bɔ ʋji groh gʌi, taih ʔŋ lʌih kʰaik ʔaŋjan pi duaː ɟaɔpʰra di ʔn. pn ti gʌi tu pai ʔn. gʌi tu pʌn taɔh, ʔn tu hman, tu mouh.
11 ʋae ʔn ti gʌi ʋi pra di dɛʔ duʔi mk ʔi, taih gʌi ʋi taɔh di ʔi haɔ, �jʌi hɛʔ jaɯ ʔasatʰʌipʰan kalak na ciciu luk ɟaɔpʰra gae ʔamosai.�
12 gʌi buk pae ti, taih bɔ gʌi daː tak kʰaik mɯːk bɔ gʌi daː sara ʔi mano daːra ɟaɔpʰra kɔ ru di ʔn, taih gʌi duʔi judaː bɔkagljiʔ ʋi ru di ʔn. gʌi mɤ th hmet ʔn, ʋi tɯi ʔn ɟm di ʔaiʔ gʌi daː tak ʔi soukpʰjaʔ ʔamu ʔi.
13 gʌi mɤ hɛʔ c�ou duʔi mk ʔi, taih gʌi kalo taɔh, �duʔi ni, ʔn kalak groh tu mu�ɯm luk ho ɟaɔpʰra. sʌisʌi, ʔn bɔ kalak na ciciu luk daːra ɟaɔpʰra.
14 jʌi mɤ hɛʔ jaɯ ʔn taɔh, �ʔajʌisu ʔi hɛʔ th mɯːk nasaret tʌn, ʔn di pjaiʔ ho ɟaɔpʰra, taih ʔŋ laɯ tuʔ. ʔn di bɔ buk, taih hit jʌi kɔ laɯ kɔ bjuk.��
15 gʌi hɛʔ hoe kalak pae ti, gʌi daː tak bɔ gʌi dun ʔi bɔ joe pi pae ʔarɯp ʔasatʰʌipʰan tʌn. gʌi bɔ jaɯ na ʔn hɛʔ blak pi na ʔamu ʔamaʔ ɟaɔpʰra.

��� 7
1 ʋae ʔn ti daː tak ʔi ʔɯp tuʔ duʔi ʔi hlu di ɟaɔpʰra ʋi dimu�ʔ ʔasatʰʌipʰan taɔh, �ʔŋ hman, groh pi kalak gʌi.h�
2 ʔasatʰʌipʰan ʋi ʋji groh ʔn ti taɔh, �ʔɯi bʌi daː tak bɔ bʌi binuk ʔo. ɟaɔpʰra ʔi maɯh ʔapʰouk dkkʰo tak, ʔn hɛʔ th kaplouh di ʔabrahm ʔi mouh gouŋ dk ʔʌi. ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ kaplouh di ʔn dʌiaː si kuj� ʔn kʰaik mɯːk mʌisopʰotʰam, ʔaiʔ haaɔ kuj� ʔn kʰaik mɯːk haran.
3 ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ dʌm kalak di ʔabrahm taɔh, �taih mai lʌih kʰaik mɯːk duk kuj� ʋʌiaːʋai mai, taih mai haaɔ kʰaik mɯːk pi di bj ʔo di mai.�
4 ʔn hɛʔ hoe tʰum groh pi kalak ɟaɔpʰra ɟaɯ ti, ʔn ʋi lʌih kʰaik mɯːk ʔn ʔi mouh duk kuj� gʌi duʔi ʔamjo kʰaːladai, ʋi haaɔ kuj� mɯːk haran. ʋae ʔn ti gouŋ ʔn hɛʔ hoe jm, ɟaɔpʰra ʋi tɯi ʔn haaɔ ɟm mɯːk ni, ʔi mouh duk kuj� ʔʌi dʌiaː ti ni.
5 kʰaik mɯːk ti, ɟaɔpʰra ji tu taih ʔn maɯh ʔuk kak gʌi ʔuk ʔi mouh kro ʔarak ʔn. ʔadaː ʔu plo mɤ, ʔn tu maɯh. ɟaɔpʰra ji duaː kadik sʔɟa di ʔn taɔh, �gʌi hloukhlan mai, ʔabrahm, gʌi di pʌn tuʔ mɯːk ni.� dʌiaː kalak ɟaɔpʰra groh ti, ʔabrahm hɲm maɯh gun. ʔu ʋi mɤ ʔn tu maɯh.
6 ɟaɔpʰra pi ʋi kalak di ʔn taɔh, �gʌi hloukhlan mai, gʌi di bɔ kuj� kʰaik mɯːk ʔi haɔ. gʌi ʔi haɔ di ʔɯp gʌi bɔ taih gʌi kʰm douk dun mjo. ʔadaː pʰuoun majaɔh sinm gʌi lo kʰm douk ti.�
7 hɛʔ hoe kalak groh ti, ɟaɔpʰra ʋi taɔh, �gʌi duʔi ʔi duaː douk di hloukhlan mai, gʌi ji ʋi lo kʰm douk pi duaː ʔo di gʌi. ʔo di ʋi taih gʌi kʰm hmap gʌi, taih gʌi bain hmae ʔi. hɛʔ hoe pn ti gʌi hloukhlan mai, gʌi di ʋi lʌih kʰaik mɯːk ti, ʋi th ɟm kʰaik mɯːk ni, taih gʌi ʋi krɯp ʔo.�
8 ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ hoe duaː kadik sʔɟa di ʔabrahm, ʔn ʋi c�ou ʔabrahm sua ʋain houn lkʰaːna ʔimae dun ʔi, taih ʔŋ bain lksana pi pʰrum gʌi di ɟaɔpʰra. ʋae ʔn ti ʔabrahm ʋi maɯh gun ʔimae ʔi cɤ ʔasaik. dʌiaː hɛʔ no ʔasaik daː siŋai, ʔabrahm ʋi sua ʋain houn lkʰaːna ʔn. ʋae ʔn ti ʔasaik ʋi bain gouŋ ʔakup. ʔakup ʋi bain gouŋ gʌi gaɯ di ʔa ʋi, ʔi hɛʔ ʋi bain gouŋ dk ʔʌi duʔi ʔamjo ʔisarʌil.
9 gʌi gouŋ dk ʔʌi ti, gʌi ji tu ʔɯk ʋaː gʌi ʔi cɤ ʔajo. gʌi ʋi juk ʔn, taih ʔn bain hmae ʔi haɔ, kuj� kʰaik mɯːk ʔaigɯp. ɟaɔpʰra ji kuj� rɯm dup ʔajo,
10 taih ʔn ʋi lʌih kʰaik douk pi lo kʰm ʔn dun mjo. dʌiaː kuj� ʔn kʰaik mɯːk ʔaigɯp, ɟaɔpʰra ʋi duaː ʔajo maɯh ʔaŋjan, taih kʰoundikʰm pʰaro kɔ ʔɯk ʔn. kʰoundikʰm pʰaro, ʋi taih ʔajo bain daː kaɲa ʔi ʔɯp mɯːk ʔaigɯp bɔ mɯːk, ʔɯp bɔ kʰaik ho ʔn dun mjo.
11 ʋae ʔn ti bɔ kʰaik mɯːk ʔaigɯp bɔ kʰaik mɯːk kanŋ tʌn, ʔŋ ɟm ʔakʰraaɔ ʔet bum. dʌiaː ʔn ti gʌi gouŋ dk ʔʌi, gʌi dun ʔi lo kʰm douk tak. gʌi tu pʌn di hret pi di hum na hmaɔ.
12 hɛʔ hoe, ʔakup tʌn bɔ jaɯ ʔi haɔ taɔh, ʔŋ si maɯh pi di hum kʰaik mɯːk ʔaigɯp. ʔn ʋi c�ou gun ʔn, ʔi mouh gouŋ dk ʔʌi, taih gʌi haaɔ ɟm mɯːk ʔaigɯp ʔu cɯp.
13 gʌi hɛʔ hoe ʋi th, pi ʋi haaɔ pʌiaː ʔu cɯp. dʌiaː ʔn ti ʔajo tʌn ʋi taih ʔikʔ ʔn np luk mouh ʔn ʋaː gʌi. bɔ kʰoundikʰm pʰaro kɔ np luk gʌi ʔukʔ ʔuʋaː ʔajo.
14 hɛʔ hoe pn ti ʔajo ʋi c�ou gʌi, taih gʌi dɛʔ gouŋ ʔn ʔi cɤ ʔakup bɔ ʋʌiaːʋai ʔn dun ʔi, taih gʌi th ɟm mɯːk ʔaigɯp. gʌi ʋʌiaːʋai ʔajo, gʌi bɔkagljiʔ kuj� bu gaɯ di pʰn ʋi.
15 pn ti ʔakup ʋi luk kʰaik mɯːk ʔaigɯp. bɔ ʔn bɔ gouŋ dk ʔʌi dun ʔi, gʌi kuj� kʰaik mɯːk ʔaigɯp, taih gʌi dun ʔi kɔ jm kʰaik mɯːk ʔaigɯp ti.
16 do buk gʌi ji tu kuj� sʌisʌi kʰaik mɯːk ʔaigɯp. dʌiaː ʋi lʌih gʌi duʔi ʔisarʌil kʰaik mɯːk ʔaigɯp, gʌi ʋi daɯh haaɔ do buk gouŋ dk ʔʌi, blʌih ʔoun gʌi kʰaik mɯːk sʌikʰʌim. ʔŋ mouh duk kuj� kadaɔ barʌiaɔ pi dʌm caɯh daː ʔabrahm di gʌi duʔi ʔi mouh gun ʔahamo tʌn.
17 ʋae ʔn ti ʔakʰraaɔ pi dʌm kalak ɟaɔpʰra di ʔabrahm hɛʔ krai di ɟm. gʌi duʔi ʔisarʌil hɛʔ krai di kɯːn kasaɔ kʰaik mɯːk ʔaigɯp.
18 hɛʔ hoe, ʔŋ ʋi maɯh kʰoundikʰm kamae. ʔn ji tu np masʌi luk ʔajo tʌn.
19 kʰoundikʰm kamae ti, ʔn ʋi buk na tu mu�ɯm di duʔi ʔamjo ʔʌi, taih gʌi ʋi kʰm douk tak, ʋi kʰaːhnap gʌi, c�ou ʔi haɔ ŋaɔh jm gun ʔaŋ gʌi.
20 dʌiaː ʔn ti ʔamosai ʋi gʌʔ. dʌiaː gʌʔ ʔn ti, ʔn hɛʔ c�it kasaɔ. ʔadaː ʔoi magjin gʌi pʌn di hjik ʔn kʰaik kak gouŋ ʔn.
21 hɛʔ hoe, gʌi ʋi lo ʋain ʔn. ʔŋ ji maɯh gun ʔibɯŋ kʰoundikʰm pʰaro, ʔn ʋi kadouh ʔamosai, ʋi hjik, taih ʔn bain gun ʔn, kuj� kʰaik ho kʰoundikʰm pʰaro.
22 dʌiaː ʔn ti ʔamosai ʋi hʌin tuʔ dun mjo ʔi mouh ʔaŋjan gʌi duʔi ʔaigɯp. bɔ groh pi kalak ʔn, bɔ pi buk ʔn dun mjo, ʔŋ bj ʔn maɯh puoun tak.
23 dʌiaː no ʔasak ʔn pʰuoun gaɯ sinm, ʔn ʋi taɔh di haaɔ joe duk kuj� gʌi duʔi ʔisarʌil, ʔi mouh ʋʌiaːʋai ʔn.
24 ʔn ʋi jaɯ duʔi ʔaigɯp ʔu ʋi mh duʔi ʔisarʌil ʔu ʋi. ʔn ʋi cuj� duʔi ti, ŋaɔh jm duʔi ʔaigɯp tʌn.
25 ʔamosai tʰak, ʔŋ di laɯh di naɔh gʌi duʔi ʔisarʌil, luk ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ tɯi ʔn, taih ʔn cuj� gʌi lʌih kʰaik douk tak gʌi. ʔŋ ji tu laɯh masʌi kʰaik naɔh gʌi.
26 paː kʰaihɲa ʔamosai pi ʋi haaɔ duk kuj� gʌi, pi ʋi jaɯ duʔi ʔamjo ʔisarʌil ʔa ʋi hɛʔ lae kalouʔ. ʔn ʋi tʰʌiaɔ di kʰrai gae, taih gae ʋi lae daːkʰɯi. ʔn taɔh, �ʔɯi, bae mouh ʔu binuk. hmaɔ ʔŋ pae pi lae kalouʔ bae.h�
27 duʔi ʔi mh pʌiaː ʋi, ʔn ji gih ʋain ʔamosai ʋi taɔh, �ʔasʌi hɛʔ taih mai bain daː kaɲa ʔi ʔɯp jʌi, soukpʰjaʔ ʔamu jʌi.h
28 mai si ŋaɔh ʋain ʔo, taih ʔŋ pi mai ŋaɔh ʋain duʔi ʔaigɯp dʌiaː th mai ʔahmaɯ.h�
29 ʔamosai hɛʔ hoe tʰum groh duʔi ti, ʔn ʋi taɔ lʌih kʰaik mɯːk ʔaigɯp, ʋi haaɔ kuj� rɯm dup gʌi duʔi ʔamjo midiʔan, bain kʰaiʔ kʰaik mɯːk ti. dʌiaː kuj� ʔn kʰaik mɯːk midiʔan, ʔn ʋi maɯh gun ʔimae ʔa ʋi.
30 ʋae ʔn ti ʔŋ bɔ no pʰuoun gaɯ sinm. ʔu siŋai, ʔamosai kuj� duk kahaɔh ʔu plo, ʔi kuj� katʔ nun sinae. ʔn ʋi jaɯ ʔamu ʔamaʔ ɟaɔpʰra ʔu kadk kaplouh di ʔn, kuj� kʰaik juoun ʔi maɯh ŋaɔ.
31 ʔamosai hɛʔ jaɯ ʔati, ʔn ʋi ʔam kasaɔ. ʔn ʋi haaɔ kʰjri, taih ʔn joe sikʰja. ʔn ʋi jaɯ groh ɟaɔpʰra taɔh di ʔn,
32 �ʔo mouh ɟaɔpʰra pi krɯp gʌi gouŋ dk mai. ʔo mouh ɟaɔpʰra pi krɯp ʔabrahm bɔ ʔasaik bɔ ʔakup tʌn.� dʌiaː jaɯ ʔamosai groh ti, ʔn dijʌiŋ, tu j joe pʌiaː ʔu ɟʌiŋ.
33 ɟaɔpʰra ʋi taɔh di ʔn, �taih mai bouʔ kʰudiŋ mai. duk kuj� mai ti, ʔŋ mouh duk boe.
34 ʔo hɛʔ hoe joe sikʰja duʔi ʔo. ʔo hɛʔ hoe jaɯ douk tak pi kʰm gʌi. ʔo hɛʔ jaɯ kʰɛʔ diʔih gʌi naɔh gʌi. dʌiaː ti ni, ʔo hɛʔ luk, taih ʔo kʰjoe gʌi. mai ʔamosai, taih mai th katʔ ʔo. ʔo di tɯi mai ʋi ʋiu kʰaik mɯːk ʔaigɯp.�
35 ʔamosai ti gʌi duʔi ʔisarʌil hɛʔ hoe ʋain. gʌi hɛʔ hoe taɔh, �ʔasʌi hɛʔ taih mai ʔɯp jʌi, soukpʰjaʔ ʔamu jʌi.h� ʋae ʔn ti ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ ʋi dɛʔ ʔn, ʋi taih ʔn bain daː tak ʔi ʔɯp gʌi, taih ʔn soukpʰjaʔ ʔamu gʌi. kʰɛʔ ti ʔamu ʔamaʔ ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ c�ou ʔamosai buk dʌiaː kaplouh ʔn kʰaik juoun di ʔaiʔ ʔamosai.
36 ʋae ʔn ti ʔamosai ʋi tɯi gʌi duʔi ʔisarʌil lʌih kʰaik mɯːk ʔaigɯp. ʔaiʔ lʌih gʌi, ʔn hɛʔ buk na mu�ɯm ʔam kasaɔ taih ʔŋ bj puoun ɟaɔpʰra. hɛʔ hoe, ʔn ʋi tɯi gʌi, taih gʌi haaɔ kaloh ʔɯm hnuk rʌiŋ, taih gʌi ʋi haaɔ kʰaik duk kahaɔh ʔadaː pʰuoun gaɯ sinm.
37 ʔŋ bɔ mouh ʔamosai ti, ʔn hɛʔ dʌm taɔh di duʔi ʔisarʌil, �ɟaɔpʰra di tɯi duʔi ʔi bjan groh ɟaɔpʰra ʔu ʋi. ʔn di th katai bʌi. daː sara ti, ʔn bɔ pi ʔo.�
38 ʔamosai ti bɔ kuj� rɯm dup duʔi ʔamjo ʔʌi dʌiaː kuj� gʌi kʰaik duk kahaɔh. ʔn mɤ hɛʔ kuj� katʔ ʔamu ʔamaʔ ɟaɔpʰra dʌiaː kalak ʔamu ʔamaʔ ɟaɔpʰra groh di ʔn dʌiaː kuj� ʔn daik nun sinae. ʔamosai mɤ jaɯ groh ɟaɔpʰra, taih ʔn ʋi kalak taih ʔʌi tʰum. groh ti, ʔŋ mouh groh ʔi pʌn duaː ʔasak di duʔi.
39 gʌi gouŋ dk ʔʌi, gʌi ji tu ʔɯk di tʰum dup groh ʔamosai. kʰaik naɔh gʌi gʌi ʋain groh ʔn, taih ʔŋ bain naɔh si ʋi ʋʌiŋ mɯːk ʔaigɯp tʌn.
40 pn ti gʌi ʋi taɔh di ʔarun tʌn, �taih mai buk ʔarɯp ɟaɔpʰra duaː di jʌi. taih ɟaɔpʰra jaiʔ di ʔaiʔ ʔʌi. ʔamosai ʔi hɛʔ jaiʔ ʔʌi lʌih kʰaik mɯːk ʔaigɯp, ʔʌi tu np na hmaɔ ʔn kuj�. ʔʌi tu np pi pae ʔn daik nun nʌiŋ.�
41 gʌi hɛʔ hoe kalak groh ti, gʌi buk ʔarɯp mk, taɔh ʔŋ mouh ɟaɔpʰra. gʌi ʋi hlu di mamk ti, buk bluj� krɯp mamk ti ʔi mouh ɟaɔpʰra pi buk gʌi ta dai gʌi.
42 ɟaɔpʰra ji tu ʔɯk pi buk gʌi. ʔn ʋi blʌih ʋain gʌi, taih gʌi ʋi krɯp simŋ ʔi kuj� kʰaik blʌiŋ. pi buk gʌi ɟaɯ ti, ʔŋ bɔ pi pi daim ʔoun gʌi duʔi ʔi bjan groh ɟaɔpʰra. gʌi hɛʔ dʌm taɔh, �ʔɯi bʌi duʔi ʔisarʌil, dʌiaː kuj� bʌi kʰaik duk kahaɔh ʔadaː pʰuoun gaɯ sinm, bʌi hɛʔ ŋaɔh jm do sʔdaːʋaː, taɔh di hlu. bʌi ji tu dʌm hlu di ʔo, ʔi mouh ɟaɔpʰra.
43 bʌi hɛʔ krɯp ʔarɯp ɟaɔ moloh taɔh ʔŋ mouh ɟaɔpʰra. bʌi mɤ hɛʔ krɯp simŋ, ʔi mouh ʔarɯp ɟaɔ ʔarʌipʰan. bʌi hɛʔ buk ʔarɯp gʌi ti, taih bʌi ʋi krɯp. kʰo ʔn ti ʔo ɟaɔpʰra di ʋi souʔ bʌi lʌih kʰaik mɯːk bʌi, taih bʌi haaɔ kuj� tuk, kuj� mɯːk babai.� gʌi duʔi ʔi bjan groh ɟaɔpʰra, gʌi hɛʔ taɔh pae ti.
44 ʔo ji taɔh di bʌi, dʌiaː kuj� gouŋ dk ʔʌi kʰaik duk kahaɔh, gʌi hɛʔ maɯh tʰɯp ʔi mouh duk kuj� ɟaɔpʰra. gʌi hɛʔ buk tʰɯp ti, taih ʔŋ pi pi bj ɟaɔpʰra di ʔamosai. ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ taih ʔn jaɯ ʔarɯp tʰɯp ti di ʔaiʔ, taih ʔn np di buk. hɛʔ hoe, gʌi hɛʔ daɯh goe tʰɯp ti jaiʔ di ʔaiʔ gʌi haaɔ duk ɟm gʌi dun plo.
45 ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ hoe duaː tʰɯp ti di gʌi. dʌiaː ʋi ʔɯp ʔajɔsu gʌi duʔi ʔamjo ʔʌi, gʌi ʋi daɯh tʰɯp ti tɯi ɟm kʰaik mɯːk kanŋ, ʔi mouh duk kuj� ʔʌi dʌiaː ti ni. dʌiaː lɯp gʌi kʰaik mɯːk kanŋ, ɟaɔpʰra mɤ ʋain gʌi duʔi ʔamjo haɔ, taih gʌi duʔi ʔamjo ʔʌi ʋi kuj� kʰaik mɯːk ti. tʰɯp ɟaɔpʰra ti ji kuj� kʰaik mɯːk ti kɔ ʋi ɟm ʔakʰraaɔ ʋi bain ʔadaːʋit kʰoundikʰm, ʋi ʔɯp mɯːk ʔʌi.
46 ɟaɔpʰra ji ʋo ʔadaːʋit. kʰo, ʔadaːʋit ʋi hmaŋ taih ɟaɔpʰra kʰʋaːk ʔn sm ho tak, taih ʔŋ bain duk kuj� ɟaɔpʰra pi krɯp ʔakup.
47 ʔŋ ji mouh kʰoundikʰm ʔasalomo ʔi hɛʔ ʋi sm ho ɟaɔpʰra.
48 ɟaɔpʰra ʔi mouh ɟaɔpʰra ʔi tak lu�ɯm tuʔ, ʔn ji tu kuj� kʰaik kak pi buk duʔi ta dai gʌi. ʔŋ pi pi dʌm kalak duʔi ʔi bjan groh ɟaɔpʰra ʔi hɛʔ daim ʔoun groh ɟaɔpʰra taɔh,
49 �gaːkhraaɔ hɛʔ mouh duk kuj� ʔo. kadae pi ʔmbak duk blʌih ʔo plaɔ ʔo. sʌi ʔŋ pae ti, kak mjo hmaɔ bʌi si buk, taih ʔo kuj� na kʰaik.h� ɟaɔpʰra mɤ taɔh, �duk hmaɔ bʌi tʰak ʔo pʌn dihlaɔ.h
50 bʌi hɛʔ piu, ʔŋ mouh ʔo, ʔi hɛʔ buk tuʔ dun mjo, taih ʔŋ bain, taih ʔŋ maɯh.� gʌi duʔi ʔi bjan groh ɟaɔpʰra, gʌi hɛʔ taɔh pae ti.
51 ʔo ji taɔh di bʌi, naɔh bʌi hɛʔ dɤ kasaɔ. bʌi tu ʋain na tu mu�ɯm kʰaik naɔh bʌi. bɔ na tu mu�ɯm ʔi dɯk di hjo bʌi, bʌi tu ʋain masʌi. bʌi pi gouŋ bʌi, ʔi kuj� kʰaː ʔaiʔ. bʌi tu ʔɯk di tʰum dup pi bj naɔh pʰʌm ɟaɔpʰra di bʌi.
52 bɔ gouŋ dk bʌi ʔi kuj� kʰaː ʔaiʔ hɛʔ dʌm duaː douk di duʔi ʔi bjan groh ɟaɔpʰra. ʔaaɔ maɯh daː sara kʰʌiaː ʔu ʋi, ʔi tu kadouh douk di gouŋ dk bʌi. ʔŋ hɛʔ maɯh gʌi duʔi ʔi bjan groh ɟaɔpʰra, gʌi hɛʔ dʌm kalak luk duʔi mu�ɯm pi di tɯi ɟaɔpʰra. hɛʔ hoe, gouŋ dk bʌi ʔi kuj� kʰaː ʔaiʔ gʌi hɛʔ ʋain daː sara gʌi ti. dʌiaː ti ni, duʔi mu�ɯm pi tɯi ɟaɔpʰra, ʔn hɛʔ hoe th. bʌi ji hɛʔ ʔap ʔn di daː tak, ŋaɔh ʋain bɔ ʔn.
53 ʔŋ mouh bʌi. bʌi hɛʔ pʌn daːra boe. ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ c�ou gʌi ʔamu ʔamaʔ ʔn duaː daːra ʔn di bʌi. bʌi ji tu dup daːra ti.�
54 ʔasatʰʌipʰan hɛʔ hoe kalak groh ti, gʌi daː tak ʔi soukpʰjaʔ daːra, gʌi bɔ ru kasaɔ. gʌi sigit hrak gʌi kup ru gʌi.
55 ʔasatʰʌipʰan ji joe gaːkhraaɔ. naɔh pʰʌm ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ no kʰaik naɔh ʔn. ʔn sakaɯh joe na daik bɔ jaɯ ʔaruk blak ɟaɔpʰra. bɔ ɟaɔ jʌisu kuj� blak ʔaʔh ɟaɔpʰra.
56 dʌiaː ʔn ti ʔn ʋi taɔh, �taih bʌi joe. ʔo hɛʔ jaɯ maloh gaːkhraaɔ hɛʔ ʔŋʋaɯh. bɔ ʔn ɟaɔ ʔi hɛʔ dʌm bain gun duʔi hɛʔ kuj� blak ʔaʔh ɟaɔpʰra.�
57 dʌiaː kalak ʔn groh ti, gʌi ʋi kabit hjo gʌi, ʋi dʔ rjik. gʌi ʋi haaɔ karup ʔn,
58 ʋi daɯh ʔn lʌih t mɯːk. hɛʔ hoe, gʌi ʋi daɯh maaɔ ʋɯŋ di ʔn taih ʔn kɔ jm. dʌiaː buk gʌi pae ti, gʌi duʔi tʌn, ʔi hɛʔ kalo di kalak na tu mu�ɯm luk ʔasatʰʌipʰan, gʌi hɛʔ bouʔ kʰrɯk gʌi, blʌih daik kadae. ʔŋ ji maɯh kaɲum ʔu ʋi, ʔn cɤ ʔasɔlu. ʔn ʋi b�ou kʰrɯk gʌi ti.
59 dʌiaː ʋɯŋ gʌi maaɔ di ʔasatʰʌipʰan, ʔn ʋi sakʰaɯ ɟaɔpʰra taɔh, �ʔɯi mai ɟaɔ jʌisu, taih mai ruouh naɔh pʰʌm ʔo.�
60 hɛʔ hoe pn ti ʔn ʋi kʰrɯpkʰraɔ, ʋi dʔ tak taɔh, �ʔɯi mai ɟaɔpʰra, kɔe taih gʌi kʰm hmap pi buk gʌi ti.� ʔn hɛʔ hoe taɔh pae ti, pʰʌm ʔn bɔ tuʔ.

��� 8
1 dʌiaː ŋaɔh gʌi ʔasatʰʌipʰan bɔ ʔasɔlu hɛʔ kuj� rɯm dup gʌi. bɔ ʔn hɛʔ pʰrum taih gʌi ŋaɔh ʔasak ʔasatʰʌipʰan. ʔu siŋ siŋai ʔn ti, gʌi duʔi kʰaik pʰɯk ɟaɔ jʌisu, gʌi ʔi kuj� kʰaik mɯːk jʌirusalaim, gʌi lo kʰm douk tak bain mjo bain mjo. gʌi dun ʔi lo kajaɔh, lʌih kʰaik mɯːk jʌirusalaim, haaɔ kuj� bain plo bain plo kʰaik ʔɯːk judaː bɔ kʰaik mɯːk samari. ʔŋ ji maɯh mi gʌi duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔ jʌisu, gʌi si kuj� kʰaik mɯːk jʌirusalaim.
2 ʔŋ ji maɯh duʔi ʔi hɲɯm ʔi dup ʔŋtʌiŋ ɟaɔpʰra, gʌi ʋi dip do buk ʔasatʰʌipʰan. gʌi bɔ klaɯ kasaɔ, ʋi jam tak kup jm ʔn.
3 ʔasɔlu tʌn ji ru kasaɔ di gʌi duʔi ʔi lɯp kʰaik pʰɯk ɟaɔ jʌisu dun ʔi. ʔn bɔ haaɔ kʰaik kak dun kak, dɯːʔ lʌih gʌi duʔi ʔi hɲɯm ɟaɔ jʌisu, bɔ ʔimae ʔibɯŋ. ʔn ʋi hmet kʰruk gʌi kʰaik kapɯm.
4 gʌi duʔi ʔi dʌm kajaɔh haaɔ dun plo, gʌi ʋi haaɔ dun na dun plo kʰaik mɯːk bɔ mɯːk. gʌi bɔ ɟm na hmaɔ, gʌi ʋi kalak groh ɟaɔpʰra taih ʔi tʰum.
5 ʔŋ ji mouh ʔapʰilip tʌn, ʔn bɔ haaɔ ɟm ʔu plo kʰaik ʔɯːk samari. ʔn ʋi kalak groh luk duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔpʰra taih ʔn kʰjoe duʔi.
6 dʌiaː jaɯ gʌi duʔi samari groh ʔn ti bɔ na mu�ɯm ʔam kasaɔ pi buk ʔn, gʌi ʋi tʰum sikʰja groh pi kalak ʔn.
7 ʔŋ bɔ maɯh duʔi kɯːn, ʔi maɯh kanm hae kuj� kʰaik do buk gʌi, gʌi ʋi dʔ tak, lʌih kʰaik do buk duʔi ti. bɔ duʔi ʔi maɯh plaɔ gʌi dai ʔi hɛʔ jm, bɔ gʌi duʔi c�ʌi ʋi kain.
8 pae ti, gʌi duʔi ʔi kuj� kʰaik mɯːk tʌn, gʌi bɔ daːkʰɯi kasaɔ.
9 kʰaik mɯːk tʌn, ʔŋ bɔ maɯh duʔi ʔu ʋi, ʔn cɤ ʔasimun. ʔn mouh daː ʔi hjik kanm. pi buk ʔn, ʔŋ taih gʌi duʔi kɯːn kʰaik ʔɯːk samari kɔ ʔam kasaɔ. ʔn pikʰɯk ʔn taɔh, ʔn mouh duʔi boe, duʔi ʔi maɯh puoun tak.
10 gʌi duʔi bɔkagljiʔ, bɔ gʌi ʔi tji ʔi tak, gʌi ʋi tʰum groh ʔn. gʌi ʋi taɔh, �hɛʔ mouh hɛʔ hman, duʔi ti maɯh puoun tak pi duaː ɟaɔpʰra di ʔn.�
11 kup hɛʔ np ʔn di buk na mu�ɯm ʔam kasaɔ ti hɛʔ hlʌiŋ, gʌi dup ʔn.
12 gʌi duʔi ɟaɯ ti, gʌi ʋi tʰum groh pi kalak ʔapʰilip luk ɟaɔpʰra di ʔɯp kadae bɔ luk ɟaɔ jʌisu kʰjoe duʔi. gʌi hɛʔ hoe tʰum luk ʔn ti, gʌi ʋi hɲɯm. bɔ gʌi ʔimae ʔibɯŋ ʋi kʰm di cɯp kʰaik ʔɯm.
13 bɔ ʔasimun tʌn ʋi hɲɯm ɟaɔ jʌisu. hɛʔ hoe, bɔ ʔn ʋi taih ʔapʰilip cɯp ʔn kʰaik ʔɯm. ʔn ʋi haaɔ dup ʔapʰilip, taih ʔn kɔ haaɔ ɟm dun na dun plo duk haaɔ ɟm ʔapʰilip. ʔn ʋi ʔam kasaɔ dʌiaː jaɯ ʔn na mu�ɯm ʔam kasaɔ pi buk ʔapʰilip, ʔi bj puoun ɟaɔpʰra.
14 gʌi duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔ jʌisu ʔi kuj� kʰaik mɯːk jʌirusalaim, gʌi bɔ np luk duʔi ʔamjo samari hɛʔ taih groh ɟaɔpʰra lɯp kʰaik naɔh gʌi, gʌi ʋi tɯi ʔapʌitaru gae ʔajɔhan tʌn, taih gae haaɔ ɟm duk kuj� gʌi duʔi ʔi hɲɯm ɟaɔpʰra kʰaik ʔɯːk samari.
15�16 gae hɛʔ hoe ɟm, gae bɔ np, kup hɲɯm gʌi ɟaɔ jʌisu, gʌi hɛʔ hoe kʰm di cɯp kʰaik ʔɯm. naɔh pʰʌm ɟaɔpʰra ji hɲm lɯp kʰaik naɔh gʌi. kʰo, gae ʋi sakʰaɯ taih ɟaɔpʰra duaː naɔh pʰʌm ʔn lɯp bɔ kʰaik naɔh gʌi.
17 gae hɛʔ hoe sakʰaɯ, gae ʋi daːk dai gae daik giŋ gʌi. pn ti naɔh pʰʌm ɟaɔpʰra bɔ lɯp kʰaik naɔh gʌi.
18 ʔasimun tʌn, ʔn ji jaɯ naɔh pʰʌm ɟaɔpʰra lɯp kʰaik naɔh duʔi dʌiaː daːk ʔapʌitaru gae ʔajɔhan dai gae daik giŋ duʔi tʌn, ʔn ʋi taɔh di duaː rʌn di gae.
19 ʔn ʋi taɔh, �taih bae duaː puoun ti bɔ di ʔo. taih bɔ ʔo pʌn di daːk dai ʔo daik giŋ duʔi, taih naɔh pʰʌm ɟaɔpʰra lɯp kʰaik naɔh gʌi.�
20 ʔapʌitaru taɔh di ʔn, �bɔ mai bɔ rʌn mai, taih ʔŋ c�ɯm. mai hɛʔ tʰak mai pʌn caɯh pi duaː ɟaɔpʰra di ʔi ta rʌn. ʔaaɔ mouh pae ti.
21 naɔh mai ʔaaɔ mu�ɯm, ʔaaɔ hman di ʔaiʔ ɟaɔpʰra. kʰo, mai tu pʌn buk pi buk jae.
22 taih mai ʋain na tu mu�ɯm kʰaik naɔh mai, taih mai sakʰaɯ ɟaɔpʰra. sʌi ʔŋ bɔ pʌn, taih ɟaɔpʰra gaɔh ʋain naɔh si pʌn mai puoun ti.
23 ʔo hɛʔ np, naɔh mai ʔaaɔ ʔh bɔ buk hmap sʌisʌi.�
24 ʔapʌitaru hɛʔ hoe kalak groh ti, ʔasimun tʌn ʋi taɔh, �taih mai sakʰaɯ ɟaɔpʰra daːk ʔo, kɔe taih ʔŋ bain pi kalak mai.�
25 ʋae ʔn ti ʔapʌitaru gae ʔajɔhan tʌn, gae hɛʔ hoe kalak luk ɟaɔ jʌisu, hɛʔ hoe kalak di duʔi kɯːn luk groh ɟaɔpʰra, gae ʋi ʋiu mɯːk jʌirusalaim. dʌiaː haaɔ gae dup ʔŋtʌiŋ, gae ʋi ho daːra luk ɟaɔpʰra kʰjoe duʔi, taih gʌi duʔi samari bain raɔ bain raɔ pʌn di tʰum.
26 ʔapʰilip tʌn, dʌiaː kuj� ʔn kʰaik ʔɯːk samari, ʔŋ ji maɯh ʔamu ʔamaʔ ɟaɔpʰra ʔu kadk th kaplouh di ʔn taɔh, �mai lʌih luk na tet, ʋi haaɔ taih mai ɟm di ʔŋtʌiŋ ʔi th mɯːk jʌirusalaim, ʋi haaɔ mɯːk gaːsa ʔi mouh ʔŋtʌiŋ ʔi kaloh duk kahaɔh.�
27 ʔamu ʔamaʔ ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ hoe kalak groh ti, ʔapʰilip mɤ jit haaɔ taih ʔn ɟm di ʔŋtʌiŋ tʌn. ʔn ʋi katouŋ duʔi ʔu ʋi ʔi th mɯːk ʔʌitʰiʔup. ʔn mouh ʔimae sh ʔi b�ou krokram nak hɔkʰm kʰaik mɯːk ʔʌitʰiʔup. nak hɔkʰm ti, ʔn cɤ kndaːsʌi. duʔi ti, ʔn hɛʔ hoe haaɔ mɯːk jʌirusalaim, taih ʔn krɯp ɟaɔpʰra.
28 dʌiaː ʔn ti ʔn ʋi ʋiu mɯːk ʔn. ʔn kuj� kʰaik lklaɔ� ʔn, tih tʰm. bp pi tih ʔn, ʔŋ mouh bp pi daim duʔi ʔi bjan groh ɟaɔpʰra ʔi cɤ ʔaʔisaj.
29 naɔh pʰʌm ɟaɔpʰra ʋi taɔh di ʔapʰilip, �taih mai haaɔ kʰjri lklaɔ ti bɔ haaɔ rɯm dup ʔn.�
30 pn ti ʔapʰilip ʋi haaɔ kʰjri lklaɔ tʌn. ʔn ʋi jaɯ duʔi tʌn tih tʰm kʰaik bp pi daim daː sara ʔaʔisaj, ʔi mouh duʔi ʔi bjan groh ɟaɔpʰra. pn ti ʔapʰilip dimu�ʔ ʔn taɔh, �ʔɯi daː, mai np luk daːk groh pi tih mai ti.h�
31 duʔi ʔi th mɯːk ʔʌitʰiʔup tʌn, ʔn ʋi ʋji groh ti taɔh, �hmaɔ ʔo di pae di np groh ʔn ti, sʌi ʔaaɔ maɯh duʔi mano ʔo.h� ʔn hɛʔ hoe taɔh pae ti, ʔn ʋi dɛʔ ʔapʰilip th ho daik lklaɔ ʔn, taih gae kuj� rɯm.
32 kʰaːn tʰm pi tih ʔn, ʔŋ ji haaɔ pae ni taɔh, �ʔn ɟaɔ pi mabu pi ŋaɔh jm gʌi duʔi. ʔn bɔ pi gun mabu. dʌiaː kp gʌi hɯk ʔn, ʔn tu taɔh masʌi. pae ti ʔn ɟaɔ bɔ kuj� situk tu taɔh masʌi,
33 ʔn hɛʔ pihnim ʔn, taih gʌi pʰjak ʔn. hɛʔ hoe, gʌi bɔ ŋaɔh ʋain ʔasak ʔn. kʰo, ʔn mɤ tu maɯh hloukhlan.� pae ti hɛʔ daim ʔoun kʰaik bp pi tih ʔn.
34 duʔi th mɯːk ʔʌitʰiʔup tʌn, ʔn dimu�ʔ ʔapʰilip taɔh, �taih mai kalak di ʔo, taih ʔo np. duʔi ʔi bjan groh ɟaɔpʰra ti, ʔn kalak groh ti luk ʔasʌi.h ʔn kalak luk do ʔn, ʔn kalak luk duʔi pʌiaː ʔu ʋi.h�
35 ʔn hɛʔ hoe kalak groh ti, ʔapʰilip ʋi couh di kalak luk kʰaːn pi tih gae kʰaik bp ɟaɔpʰra, taih ʔn kɔ np luk ɟaɔ jʌisu.
36 dʌiaː haaɔ gae dup ʔŋtʌiŋ tʌn, gae ʋi ha ɟm duk maɯh blaik ʔɯm. duʔi ʔi th mɯːk ʔʌitʰiʔup ʋi taɔh, �ni, ʔŋ maɯh ʔɯm. ʔŋ pʌn cɯp ʔo kʰaik ʔɯm ni dʌiaː ti ni.h�
37 ʔapʰilip ʋi taɔh, �sʌi mai hɲɯm sikʰja ɟaɔ jʌisu kʰaik naɔh, hɛʔ pʌn.� ʔn ʋi taɔh, �ʔo hɛʔ hɲɯm, ɟaɔ jʌisu mouh gun ɟaɔpʰra.�
38 pn ti ʔn ʋi c�ou lklaɔ gɯːʔ. hɛʔ hoe, gae ʋi lʌih kʰaik lklaɔ. duʔi ʔi th mɯːk ʔʌitʰiʔup tʌn ʋi taih ʔapʰilip cɯp ʔn kʰaik ʔɯm.
39 hɛʔ hoe pn ti dʌiaː lʌih gae kʰaik ʔɯm tʌn, ʔŋ ʋi maɯh naɔh pʰʌm ɟaɔpʰra th daɯh ʔapʰilip ʔu ɟʌiŋ, taih ʔn kɔ hrae di ʔaiʔ duʔi ʔi th mɯːk ʔʌitʰiʔup, ʔaaɔ hu taih ʔn jaɯ ʔapʰilip. ʔn ji ʋi haaɔ dup ʔŋtʌiŋ pi lo haaɔ ʔn. naɔh ʔn bɔ daːkʰɯi kasaɔ.
40 ʔŋ ji mouh ʔapʰilip, ʔn hɛʔ ʋi ɟm mɯːk ʔasotʰu ʔu ɟʌiŋ. ʔn ʋi haaɔ kalak luk ɟaɔpʰra ʔi kʰjoe duʔi kʰaik mɯːk dun mɯːk, taih ʔn kɔ ɟm bɔ mɯːk kʌisarʌi.

��� 9
1 ʔakʰraaɔ dʌiaː ʔn ti ʔŋ ji mouh ʔasɔlu tʌn. ʔn ji si nɛʔ kacu�a haaɔ gʌi dibai ɟaɔ jʌisu, taɔh di ŋaɔh ʋain gʌi. ʔn bɔ haaɔ duk kuj� daː tak ʔi ʔɯp tuʔ duʔi ʔi hlu di ɟaɔpʰra.
2 ʔn hmaŋ di daː tak ʔi ʔɯp tuʔ duʔi ʔi hlu di ɟaɔpʰra, taih daː tak ti duaː pɛʔ di ʔn, taih ʔn ʋi haaɔ tɯi di daː tak kʰaik ɟuk krɯp gʌi duʔi judaː ɟaɔpʰra ʔi kuj� kʰaik mɯːk daːmakʰu. pɛʔ ti kʰʋaːk ʔn hret gʌi duʔi ʔi dup ʔŋtʌiŋ ɟaɔ jʌisu. ʔn hi jaɯ gʌi bɔ mouh ʔibɯŋ ʔimae, ʔn pʌn hmet tuʔ gʌi, ʋi tɯi gʌi haaɔ ɟm mɯːk jʌirusalaim, kʰruk gʌi kʰaik kapɯm.
3 dʌiaː th ɟm ʔn katʔ mɯːk daːmakʰu tʌn, ʔu ɟʌiŋ, ʔŋ maɯh blak tak th kʰaik gaːkhraaɔ luk, ʋi laip rup ʔn.
4 ʔasɔlu bɔ gɯp daik kadae, ʔn bɔ pʌn jaɯ groh ʔi kalak di ʔn taɔh, �ʔɯi ʔasɔlu, hmaɔ ʔŋ pae pi buk mai na tu mu�ɯm di ʔo.h�
5 ʔasɔlu ʋi taɔh, �ʔasʌi mai mouh, mai ɟaɔ.h� ʔn ʋi taɔh, �ʔo mouh ɟaɔ jʌisu, ʋi pi buk mai na tu mu�ɯm.
6 dʌiaː ti ni, taih mai jit haaɔ mɯːk daːmakʰu. ʔŋ di maɯh duʔi ʔu ʋi, ʔn di ʋi kalak taih mai np pi lo buk mai.�
7 gʌi duʔi ʔi haaɔ dup ʔasɔlu tʌn, gʌi ʔam kasaɔ, ʔaaɔ hu pʌn taɔh masʌi. gʌi hɛʔ jaɯ groh, ji tu jaɯ ʔasʌi, ʔi kalak groh ti.
8 ʔasɔlu ji ʋi jit duk gɯp ʔn tʌn, ʋi blak ŋae ʔn, ji tu pʌn jaɯ masʌi. kʰo, gʌi ʋi paː dai ʔn, tɯi ʔn haaɔ lɯp kʰaik mɯːk daːmakʰu.
9 ʔadaː ʔoi siŋai ŋae ʔn ʔp, ʔaaɔ pʌn jaɯ masʌi. dʌiaː ʔn ti ʔn mɤ tu hum tu djik masʌi.
10 kʰaik mɯːk daːmakʰu tʌn, ʔŋ ji maɯh dibai ɟaɔ jʌisu ʔu ʋi. ʔn cɤ ʔanani. ʔanani tʌn ʋi jaɯ ʔaruk pi bj ɟaɔpʰra di ʔn. ʔn ɟaɔ ʋi dɛʔ ʔn taɔh, �ʔɯi, ʔanani.� ʔanani ʋi taɔh, �ʔɯi mai ɟaɔ, ʔo kuj� di ni. ʔo tʰum groh mai.�
11 hɛʔ hoe, ɟaɔpʰra ʋi taɔh, �taih mai jit haaɔ dup ʔŋtʌiŋ, ʔi cɤ ʔŋtʌiŋ sɤ tʌn. taih mai haaɔ lɯp kʰaik kak ʔajudʔ tʌn. taih mai dimu�ʔ duʔi kʰaik kak, jo ʔŋ maɯh duʔi ʔu ʋi, ʔi th mɯːk tʰasu, cɤ ʔasɔlu. duʔi ti, ʔn kuj� kʰaik kak ti, sakʰaɯ di ʔo.
12 ʔn mɤ hɛʔ jaɯ ʔaruk pi bj ʔo di ʔn. ʔn hɛʔ jaɯ duʔi ʔu ʋi ʔi cɤ ʔanani, hɛʔ th duk kuj� ʔn bɔ daːk dai daik giŋ ʔn, taih ʔn ʋi pʌn jaɯ.�
13 ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ hoe kalak groh ti, ʔanani tʌn ʋi taɔh, �ʔɯi mai ɟaɔ, ʔo hɛʔ jaɯ gʌi duʔi kɯːn kalak luk ʔn taɔh, ʔn hɛʔ buk na tu mu�ɯm dun mjo di gʌi duʔi boe, duʔi ʔi hɲɯm mai kʰaik mɯːk jʌirusalaim.
14 gʌi taɔh, ʔn hɛʔ th ɟm duk kuj� jʌi ni. gʌi daː tak ʔi jaiʔ gʌi duʔi ʔi hlu di ɟaɔpʰra gʌi hɛʔ kʰʋaːk ʔn, taih ʔn ʋi hmet gʌi duʔi hɲɯm mai ɟaɔ, taih ʔn ʋi kʰruk gʌi kʰaik kapɯm.�
15 ɟaɔpʰra ji kalak di ʔanani. ʔn taɔh, �taih mai haaɔ. duʔi ti, ʔn mouh duʔi pi raɔh ʔo, taih ʔn cuj� ʔo, taih ʔn kalak luk ʔo di ʔaiʔ gʌi duʔi ʔamjo haɔ. ʔn bɔ lo kalak luk ʔo di ʔaiʔ kʰoundikʰm ʔi ʔɯp mɯːk ʔi haɔ bɔ di duʔi ʔisarʌil, taih gʌi tʰum.
16 ʔo di bɔ bj di ʔn, kʰɛʔ kɯːn douk pi lo kʰm ʔn kup kalak ʔn di ʔi haɔ luk ʔo.�
17 ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ hoe kalak groh ti, ʔanani ʋi haaɔ lɯp kʰaik kak tʌn, ʋi katouŋ ʔasɔlu, ʋi daːk dai ʔn daik giŋ ʔasɔlu. ʔn ʋi taɔh, �ʔɯi ʔasɔlu, mai mouh ʋaː ʔo. ɟaɔ jʌisu hɛʔ kaplouh di mai dʌiaː haaɔ mai dup ʔŋtʌiŋ, th mɯːk ni. ʔn ɟaɔ hɛʔ c�ou ʔo th duk kuj� mai ni, taih ŋae mai ʋi blak, taih naɔh pʰʌm ɟaɔpʰra lɯp kʰaik naɔh mai.�
18 dʌiaː kalak ʔn groh ti ʔu ɟʌiŋ, ʔŋ pi gaiʔ magaː� coh lʌih di ŋae ʔasɔlu tʌn. hɛʔ hoe, ŋae ʔn ʋi blak, ʋi pʌn jaɯ. ʔn ʋi jit haaɔ, taih ʔanani ʋi cɯp ʔn kʰaik ʔɯm.
19 ʋae ʔn ti ʔn ʋi hum bum, taih ʔn ʋi maɯh plum.
20 ʋae ʔn ti ʔasɔlu kuj� kʰaik mɯːk daːmakʰu ʔadaː pʰuoun pʰn siŋai. ʔn ji couh di haaɔ lɯp kʰaik ɟuk krɯp gʌi duʔi judaː ɟaɔpʰra, ho daːra ʔu ɟʌiŋ. ʔn taɔh, ɟaɔ jʌisu mouh gun ɟaɔpʰra.
21 gʌi duʔi tʰum groh pi kalak ʔn, gʌi bɔkagljiʔ ʋi ʔam kasaɔ. gʌi taɔh, �ʔn mouh duʔi ʔi hmet gʌi duʔi hɲɯm ɟaɔ jʌisu kʰaik mɯːk jʌirusalaim. ʔn mɤ hɛʔ th di ni, taih ʔn ʋi hmet bɔ gʌi ʔi hɲɯm, taih ʔn ʋi tɯi gʌi ɟm di ʔaiʔ gʌi daː tak ʔi jaiʔ gʌi duʔi ʔi hlu di ɟaɔpʰra. hmaɔ ʔŋ pae pi bjuk ʔn naɔh.h�
22 puoun ɟaɔpʰra ji hɛʔ krai di kɯːn kʰaik naɔh ʔasɔlu, taih bɔ gʌi duʔi judaː ʔi kuj� kʰaik mɯːk daːmakʰu tʌn ʋi ʔam kapuaː. ʔn kalak di gʌi, taih gʌi np sikʰja, ɟaɔ jʌisu mouh duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔpʰra taih ʔn kʰjoe duʔi.
23 ʋae ʔn ti ʔaaɔ bɔ hlʌiŋ, gʌi duʔi judaː ʋi taɔh di ŋaɔh ʋain ʔasak ʔn.
24 ʔŋ ji maɯh duʔi ʔi kalak di ʔn, taih ʔn np luk pi kʰram gʌi. gʌi hɛʔ b�ou di maloh mɯːk nuk kʰɯːn nuk ʋn, b�ou di ŋaɔh ʋain ʔn.
25 kʰaik hmaɯ, gʌi dibai ɟaɔ jʌisu ji daɯh krɯk ʔu buk, taih ʔasɔlu kuj� na kʰaik, bjua luk ʔn kʰaik kadaɔ raik mɯːk, cuj� ʔn pra di lʌih kʰaik mɯːk daːmakʰu tʌn.
26 ʋae ʔn ti ʔasɔlu ʋi haaɔ ɟm mɯːk jʌirusalaim. ʔn taɔh di kuj� rɯm dup gʌi duʔi ʔi hɲɯm ɟaɔ jʌisu. gʌi bɔkagljiʔ ji jo ʔn. gʌi tu hɲɯm ʔn hɛʔ hoe bjuk naɔh ʔn, ʋi bain dibai ɟaɔ jʌisu.
27 ʔŋ ji maɯh duʔi ʔu ʋi, ʔn cɤ ʔabanab. ʔn ʋi dɛʔ ʔasɔlu, tɯi ʔn haaɔ ɟm di ʔaiʔ gʌi duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔ jʌisu. ʔn ʋi kʰai di gʌi luk pi pae ʔasɔlu di jaɯ ɟaɔ jʌisu dʌiaː haaɔ ʔn dup ʔŋtʌiŋ tʌn. ʔn bɔ kʰai luk ɟaɔ jʌisu hɛʔ kalak groh di ʔasɔlu. hɛʔ hoe, ʔn ʋi kʰai taih gʌi np luk ʔasɔlu hɛʔ ʋi kalak groh sɤ, taih gʌi duʔi kʰaik mɯːk daːmakʰu kɔ np luk ɟaɔ jʌisu kʰjoe duʔi.
28 ʔabanab hɛʔ hoe kalak di gʌi luk ʔn ti, ʔasɔlu ʋi kuj� rɯm dup gʌi kʰaik mɯːk jʌirusalaim. ʔn mɤ tu jo masʌi, haaɔ dun na dun plo, ʋi kalak luk ɟaɔ jʌisu di gʌi dun ʔi.
29 ʔn ʋi kalak groh sɤ di gʌi duʔi judaː ʔi kalak groh grik. gʌi ji taɔh di ŋaɔh ʋain ʔn.
30 gʌi binuk bɔ np luk ʔn ti, gʌi ʋi tɯi ʔasɔlu, taih ʔn luk mɯːk kʌisarʌi. hɛʔ hoe, gʌi ʋi tɯi ʔn haaɔ ɟm mɯːk tʰasu.
31 ʋae ʔn ti gʌi duʔi kʰaik pʰɯk ɟaɔ jʌisu, gʌi ʔi kuj� kʰaik ʔɯːk judaː, ʔɯːk gaːlilʌi bɔ ʔɯːk samari, gʌi pʌn kuj� daːkʰɯi, ʔaaɔ hu maɯh duʔi ʔi si hmet gʌi. naɔh hɲɯm gʌi, ʔŋ krai di mn, gʌi bɔ jo di buk pi tu ʔɯk ɟaɔpʰra. pae ti naɔh pʰʌm ɟaɔpʰra bɔ cuj� gʌi, taih gʌi ʋi ʋai kɯːn lu�ɯm kʰaː ʔaiʔ.
32 ʋae ʔn ti ʔapʌitaru tʌn ʋi haaɔ bain plo bain plo kʰaik mɯːk bɔ mɯːk. ʔn bɔ haaɔ joe gʌi duʔi ʔi hɲɯm ɟaɔ jʌisu, ʔi kuj� kʰaik mɯːk ludaː.
33 kʰaik mɯːk ludaː tʌn, ʔŋ maɯh duʔi ʔu ʋi. ʔn cɤ ʔanʌiʔaʔ. bɔ dai bɔ plaɔ ʔn hɛʔ jm. hɛʔ pʌn daː sinm ʔn hɛʔ kuj� ʔit duk ʔit ʔn.
34 ʔapʌitaru ʋi taɔh di ʔn, �ʔɯi ʔanʌiʔaʔ, ɟaɔ jʌisu taih saɔ mai kain dʌiaː ti ni. taih mai jit daɯh ʔoun ʔmbʌiaɔ mai.� ʔn hɛʔ hoe kalak groh ti, ʔanʌiʔaʔ ʋi jit ʔu ɟʌiŋ.
35 gʌi duʔi ʔi kuj� kʰaik mɯːk ludaː tʌn bɔ gʌi duʔi ʔi kuj� kʰaik mɯːk sarun, gʌi bɔ jaɯ ʔn, gʌi ʋi bjuk naɔh, hɲɯm ɟaɔ jʌisu.
36 kʰaik mɯːk jopʰa ʔŋ ji maɯh ʔibɯŋ ʔu ʋi, ʔn cɤ tʰabitʰa. gʌi bɔ taih ʔn cɤ dokʰaː. bɔ ʔn hɛʔ mouh dibai ɟaɔ jʌisu. sʌisʌi ʔn hɛʔ dʌm buk na mu�ɯm, cuj� gʌi duʔi gin.
37 dʌiaː kuj� ʔapʌitaru kʰaik mɯːk ludaː tʌn, tʰabitʰa ti hɛʔ saɔ bɔ jm. gʌi ʋi hp ʔn ta ʔɯm. hɛʔ hoe, gʌi ʋi blʌih ʔoun ʔn kʰaik huk kʰruk daik.
38 mɯːk ludaː gae mɯːk jopʰa ʔaaɔ lae katuk. kʰo, gʌi dibai ɟaɔ jʌisu ʔi kuj� kʰaik mɯːk jopʰa bɔ np luk ʔapʌitaru kuj� mɯːk ludaː, gʌi ʋi tɯi duʔi ʔa ʋi, taih gae haaɔ dɛʔ, taih ʔn th kʰrn kʰrn.
39 pn ti ʔapʌitaru haaɔ dup gae, ɟm mɯːk jopʰa. ʔn hɛʔ hoe ɟm, gʌi ʋi tɯi ʔn ho na daik haaɔ lɯp kʰaik huk tʌn ʔu ɟʌiŋ. gʌi ja siprh bɔkagljiʔ, ʋi th kuj� rup ʔapʌitaru bɔ jam. gʌi ʋi bj di ʔn kʰrɯk ta pɛʔ hɛʔ buk duaː tʰabitʰa di gʌi dʌiaː ʔim ʔn.
40 ʔapʌitaru ji c�ou gʌi dun ʔi lʌih kʰaik huk tʌn. hɛʔ hoe, ʔn ʋi kʰrɯpkʰraɔ, sakʰaɯ ɟaɔpʰra. ʔn ʋi maŋh joe do buk ʔibɯŋ tʌn, ʋi taɔh, �ʔɯi tʰabitʰa, taih mai jit.� ʋae ʔn ti tʰabitʰa ʋi blak ŋae ʔn. ʔn bɔ jaɯ ʔapʌitaru, ʔn ʋi jit touʔ duk ʔit ʔn.
41 ʔapʌitaru ʋi cuj� ʔn taih ʔn jit cuk. hɛʔ hoe, ʔapʌitaru ʋi dɛʔ gʌi duʔi hɲɯm ɟaɔ jʌisu bɔ ja siprh gʌi tʌn, taih gʌi pʌn di jaɯ, tʰabitʰa hɛʔ ʋi jit ʋi ʔim. ʔn ʋi ʔap duaː tʰabitʰa di gʌi, taih gʌi ʋi kuj� rɯm.
42 gʌi duʔi kʰaik mɯːk jopʰa bɔ mɯːk kɔ np luk ʔn ti, taih gʌi duʔi kɯːn kɔ hɲɯm ɟaɔ jʌisu.
43 ʔapʌitaru ji kuj� hlʌiŋ kʰaik mɯːk jopʰa. ʔn kuj� kʰaik kak duʔi ʔu ʋi, ʔi cai houn do sʔdaːʋaː ʔi cɤ ʔasimun.

��� 10
1 ʔŋ ji maɯh duʔi ʔamjo roma ʔu ʋi, ʔn kuj� mɯːk kʌisarʌi. ʔn cɤ ʔakɔnʌili. ʔn mouh bo ʔi ʔɯp daː sɯk ʔu majaɔh. daː sɯk pi ʔɯp ʔn, gʌi kuj� kʰaik dp ʔitali.
2 duʔi ti bɔ gʌi duʔi ʔi kuj� kʰaik kak ʔn, gʌi bɔkagljiʔ dup daːra. gʌi hɲɯm ɟaɔpʰra ʔakʰaːkʰ�ou. ʔn bɔ maɯh naɔh dihak, duaː rʌn kɯːn di duʔi gin kʰaik ʔɯːk judaː. dun siŋai, dun siŋai ʔn bɔ sakʰaɯ di ɟaɔpʰra.
3 ʔu siŋai, dʌiaː no ʔoi nari ʋae siŋai katai, ʔn bɔ jaɯ ʔaruk pi bj ɟaɔpʰra di ʔn. ʔn jaɯ ʔamu ʔamaʔ ɟaɔpʰra ʔu kadk, hɛʔ th ɟm duk kuj� ʔn taɔh, �ʔɯi, ʔakɔnʌili.�
4 ʔakɔnʌili ji jo kasaɔ. ʔn ʋi situk joe ʔamu ʔamaʔ ɟaɔpʰra ti. ʔn ʋi dimu�ʔ taɔh, �masʌi pi lo mai ɟaɔ di ʔo.h� ʔamu ʔamaʔ ɟaɔpʰra ʋi taɔh, �pi sakʰaɯ mai dun mjo bɔ pi buk mai na mu�ɯm dun mjo, ʔŋ hɛʔ ho ɟm di ʔaiʔ ɟaɔpʰra. ɟaɔpʰra mɤ hloh ɟaɯ ti dun mjo.
5 dʌiaː ti ni, mai lo dɛʔ duʔi mk ʔi, c�ou gʌi haaɔ mɯːk jopʰa, taih gʌi haaɔ hret duʔi ʔu ʋi, ʔi cɤ ʔasimun. ʔn cɤ bɔ ʔapʌitaru.
6 ʔn kuj� kʰaik kak duʔi ʔu ʋi ʔi cai houn. bɔ ʔn cɤ ʔasimun. kak ʔn kuj� kʰup ʔɯm tak.�
7 ʔamu ʔamaʔ ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ hoe kalak groh ti, ʔn ʋi hrae ʋuk di ʔaiʔ ʔakɔnʌili tʌn. pn ti ʔakɔnʌili ʋi dɛʔ daicʌiŋ ʔn ʔa ʋi bɔ daː sɯk ʔi hɲɯm ɟaɔpʰra ʔu ʋi, ʔi kuj� rɯm dup ʔn sʌisʌi.
8 ʔn ʋi kalak tuʔ pɛʔ hɛʔ jaɯ ʔn di gʌi. hɛʔ hoe, ʔn c�ou gʌi haaɔ mɯːk jopʰa.
9 paː kʰaihɲa gʌi ʋi haaɔ dup ʔŋtʌiŋ. dʌiaː hɛʔ katʔ gʌi di ɟm mɯːk jopʰa tʌn, ʔŋ ji mouh ʔapʌitaru. ʔn hɛʔ ho kuj� di kʰruk na daik. ʔn taɔh di sakʰaɯ ɟaɔpʰra. dʌiaː ʔn ti hɛʔ mouh katai siŋai.
10 ʔn mɤ kapraŋ pi di hum. gʌi ʔi kuj� kʰaik kak ʋi rain pi di hum. dʌiaː ʔn ti ʔn ʋi jaɯ ʔaruk pi bj ɟaɔpʰra di ʔn.
11 ʔn ʋi jaɯ gaːkhraaɔ hɛʔ ʔŋʋaɯh. ʔŋ maɯh bik tak ʔu pʰɯːn ʔi maɯh bɔ ʋn hɛʔ pk di pʰuoun kato, hɛʔ lʌih luk gaːkhraaɔ, ɟm di ʔaiʔ ʔn.
12 na kʰaik bik ti, ʔŋ maɯh do sʔdaːʋaː dun mjo. mk do maɯh plaɔ pʰuoun blak. mk do mouh ʔamjo ʔi kuj� kʰaik kadaɔ kadae. mk do mouh masim ʔi bɯŋ kʰaik blʌiŋ.
13 ʔn bɔ jaɯ groh ʔi taɔh di ʔn, �ʔɯi ʔapʌitaru, taih mai jit, ŋaɔh hum do gʌi ti.�
14 ʔapʌitaru ʋi taɔh, �ʔɯi mai ɟaɔ, ʔaaɔ pʌn buk pae ti dʌiaː hmaɔ. ʔo tu dʌm hum pi di hum ʔi tu siŋaː, pi tu taih daːra jʌi hum.�
15 groh tʌn ʋi taɔh di ʔn, �kʰɛʔ pi buk ɟaɔpʰra taih ʔŋ siŋaː, mai kɔe taɔh, ʔŋ tu siŋaː.�
16 ʔoi cɯp ʔapʌitaru jaɯ ɟaɯ ti. hɛʔ hoe, bik tʌn ʋi ho gaːkhraaɔ ʔu ɟʌiŋ.
17 ʋae ʔn ti ʔapʌitaru ʋi kuj�, ɟʌiŋɟa luk masʌi ʔŋ mouh luk daːk ʔaruk pi bj ɟaɔpʰra di ʔn. dʌiaː ʔn ti gʌi duʔi pi tɯi ʔakɔnʌili tʌn, gʌi bɔ np, kak ʔasimun tʌn kuj� di hmaɔ. hɛʔ hoe gʌi hɛʔ ɟm di ʔaiʔ maloh kak ʔn.
18 gʌi mɤ dimu�ʔ taɔh, �ʔasimun ʔi cɤ bɔ ʔapʌitaru, ʔn kuj� kʰaik kak ni.h�
19 dʌiaː ʔn ti ʔapʌitaru ji si kuj� ɟʌiŋɟa luk ʔaruk tʌn, naɔh pʰʌm ɟaɔpʰra ʋi taɔh di ʔn, �ʔŋ maɯh duʔi ʔoi ʋi, gʌi hɛʔ th, hret mai.
20 taih mai jit luk na kʰrɯm, haaɔ dup gʌi. kɔe taih mai ɟʌiŋɟa masʌi, jo ʔŋ hman ʔaaɔ hman. ʔo hɛʔ tɯi gʌi th dɛʔ mai.�
21 pn ti ʔapʌitaru mɤ luk. ʔn taɔh di gʌi duʔi tʌn, �ʔŋ mouh ʔo, duʔi pi hret bʌi. hmaɔ ʔŋ pae, pi th ɟm bʌi di ni.h masʌi pi lo bʌi.h�
22 gʌi taɔh, �ʔŋ maɯh daː kaɲa jʌi, ʔn cɤ ʔakɔnʌili. ʔn mouh bo ʔi ʔɯp daː sɯk ʔu majaɔh. ʔn bɔ mouh duʔi mu�ɯm, ʔi hɲɯm ɟaɔpʰra ʔakʰaːkʰ�ou. gʌi duʔi ʔamjo judaː dun ʔi np di kalak na mu�ɯm luk ʔn. ʔamu ʔamaʔ ɟaɔpʰra ʔu kadk hɛʔ th c�ou ʔn, taih ʔn tɯi jʌi haaɔ ɟm duk kuj� mai, taih jʌi dɛʔ mai th ɟm kak ʔn. pn ti ʔn di pʌn di tʰum groh pi lo mai kalak di ʔn.�
23 gʌi hɛʔ hoe kalak groh ti, ʔapʌitaru ʋi bak gʌi lɯp kʰaik kak ʔn, taih gʌi bain kʰaiʔ ʔn.
24 paː kʰaihɲa ʔapʌitaru ʋi haaɔ dup gʌi. bɔ gʌi binuk mk ʔi, ʔi kuj� kʰaik mɯːk jopʰa tʌn, gʌi haaɔ rɯm dup ʔn.
25 pʌiaː ʔu siŋai ʔn ʋi th ɟm mɯːk kʌisarʌi. ʔakɔnʌili tʌn hɛʔ hnaɔ gʌi th. ʔn hɛʔ hoe dɛʔ ʋʌiaːʋai ʔn gʌi gɯk ʔn, taih gʌi th kaɟou kʰaik kak ʔn. pn ti ʔapʌitaru lɯp kʰaik kak ʔakɔnʌili. ʔakɔnʌili mɤ th ruouh ʔn. ʔn mɤ gɯp di ʔaiʔ ʔapʌitaru.
26 ʔapʌitaru ji c�ou ʔn jit taɔh, �taih mai jit. bɔ ʔo mouh duʔi pi mai.�
27 pn ti gae ʋi lae kalak groh, haaɔ lɯp kʰaik kak. ʔn bɔ jaɯ gʌi duʔi kɯːn hɛʔ th ɟm kʰaik kak ti.
28 ʔapʌitaru ʋi kalak groh di gʌi taɔh, �bʌi hɛʔ np, daːra jʌi duʔi judaː tu taih jʌi haaɔ bain gɯk gʌi duʔi ʔamjo haɔ. daːra tu taih jʌi haaɔ lɯp kʰaik kak gʌi. ɟaɔpʰra ji hɛʔ bj di ʔo, kɔe taih ʔo taɔh, gʌi duʔi ʔamjo haɔ tu boe, tu kʰm daːra.
29 kʰo, dʌiaː maɯh gɯk bʌi th duk kuj� ʔo, dɛʔ ʔo th duk kuj� bʌi, ʔo mɤ tu taɔh masʌi. ʔo mɤ haaɔ dup gʌi ʔu ɟʌiŋ. dʌiaː ti ni ʔo ji dimu�ʔ bʌi, taih ʔo np, hmaɔ ʔŋ pae pi dɛʔ bʌi ʔo th duk kuj� bʌi.h�
30 ʔakɔnʌili ʋi taɔh, �ʔŋ hɛʔ pʌn pʰuoun siŋai, ʔo hɛʔ kuj� kʰaik kak ni, jɯːn bum. dʌiaː mouh ʔakʰraaɔ pi dʌiaː ti ni, kabk ʔoi nari ʋae katai siŋai, ʔo bɔ sakʰaɯ ɟaɔpʰra. dʌiaː sakʰaɯ ʔo ti ʔu ɟʌiŋ, ʔŋ maɯh daː ʔu ʋi ʔi hɛʔ c�ɯp kʰrɯk blak raaɔ th kaplouh duk kuj� ʔo.
31 ʔn hɛʔ taɔh, �ʔɯi mai ʔakɔnʌili, ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ hoe jaɯ pi sakʰaɯ mai dun mjo. ʔn mɤ hɛʔ hloh na mu�ɯm dun mjo pɛʔ hɛʔ buk mai, pi duaː mai di gʌi duʔi gin.
32 dʌiaː ti ni, mai lo dɛʔ duʔi mk ʔi, c�ou gʌi haaɔ mɯːk jopʰa, taih gʌi haaɔ hret duʔi ʔu ʋi, ʔi cɤ ʔasimun. ʔn cɤ bɔ ʔapʌitaru. ʔn kuj� kʰaik kak duʔi cai houn ʔu ʋi. bɔ ʔn cɤ ʔasimun. kak ʔn kuj� kʰup ʔɯm tak.�
33 ʔn hɛʔ hoe kalak groh ti ʔu ɟʌiŋ ʔo hɛʔ tɯi duʔi haaɔ duk kuj� mai, taih gʌi dɛʔ mai th di ni. mai mɤ hɛʔ th. dʌiaː ti ni jʌi dun ʔi hɛʔ th kaɟou di ni. jʌi bɔ np, bɔ ɟaɔpʰra kuj� rɯm dup jʌi. jʌi si tʰum tuʔ dun mjo pi kalak ɟaɔpʰra di mai.�
34 ʔn hɛʔ hoe kalak groh ti, ʔapʌitaru ʋi taɔh, �dʌiaː ti ni ʔo hɛʔ np sikʰja luk ɟaɔpʰra. ʔn tu taɔh, ʔamjo duʔi ʔu mjo hɛʔ boe lu�ɯm ʔamjo duʔi pʌiaː ʔu mjo.
35 kʰaik duʔi dun mjo, ʔasʌi hɛʔ hɲɯm ɟaɔpʰra bɔ buk na hman na mu�ɯm, ɟaɔpʰra di bɔ ʔɯk ʔn.
36 bʌi dun ʔi hɛʔ np luk daːra kamae pi duaː ɟaɔpʰra di duʔi ʔisarʌil. ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ taɔh di duaː naɔh gjiʔ di duʔi dun ʔi, ʔi hɲɯm ɟaɔ jʌisu. ʔn mouh daː ʔi pi tɯi ɟaɔpʰra taih ʔn kʰjoe duʔi. ʔn bɔ mouh ʔn ɟaɔ ʔi ʔɯp tuʔ dun mjo.
37 bʌi hɛʔ np luk ɟaɔ jʌisu. kʰaː ʔaiʔ daː sara ʔajɔhan tʌn hɛʔ mano, gʌi duʔi lo kʰm di cɯp kʰaik ʔɯm. hɛʔ hoe, ɟaɔ jʌisu hɛʔ ʋi haaɔ ho daːra ɟaɔpʰra bɔ couh kʰaik ʔɯːk gaːlilʌi kɔ ɟm kʰaik ʔɯːk judaː bɔ ʔɯːk.
38 bʌi mɤ hɛʔ np luk ɟaɔpʰra. ʔn hɛʔ duaː naɔh pʰʌm ʔn bɔ puoun ʔn di ɟaɔ jʌisu, ʔi th mɯːk nasaret. hɛʔ hoe, ɟaɔ jʌisu hɛʔ haaɔ dun na dun plo kʰaik mɯːk bɔ mɯːk, buk na mu�ɯm dun mjo. kʰɛʔ maɯh duʔi pi lɯp kanm, ʔn hɛʔ taih gʌi bɔkagljiʔ ʋi kain. pae ti ʔŋ laɯh sikʰja, ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ kuj� rɯm dup ʔn, cuj� ʔn.
39 jʌi ji mouh duʔi ʔi kuj� rɯm dup ɟaɔ jʌisu. dʌiaː kuj� ʔn kʰaik mɯːk gʌi duʔi judaː bɔ kʰaik mɯːk jʌirusalaim ʔn hɛʔ buk tuʔ dun mjo pi taɔh ʔo dʌiaː ti ni. hɛʔ hoe, gʌi ʋi ŋaɔh ʔasak ʔn, taih ʔn jm daik ruk kaʋɛʔ.
40 ʔn hɛʔ hoe jm, bɔ no ʔoi siŋai, ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ taih ʔn ʋi jit ʋi ʔim, taih duʔi jaɯ ʔn.
41 gʌi dun ʔi ji tu pʌn jaɯ ʔn. ʔŋ ji mouh jʌi, ʋi pi raɔh ɟaɔpʰra kʰaː ʔaiʔ. jʌi hɛʔ pʌn jaɯ ʔn, taih jʌi ʋi pʌn kalak di ʔi haɔ. jʌi mɤ hɛʔ kuj� rɯm dup ʔn, hum bum, djik ʔɯm rɯm dup ʔn ʋae ʋi jit ʋi ʔim ʔn.
42 ɟaɔ jʌisu mɤ hɛʔ c�ou jʌi haaɔ kalak di duʔi luk ʔasak ʔn. ʔn mouh duʔi pi raɔh ɟaɔpʰra, taih ʔn bain daː tak ʔi soukpʰjaʔ daːra di duʔi dun ʔi. bɔ gʌi duʔi ʔim, bɔ gʌi duʔi ʔi hɛʔ hoe jm, ɟaɔ jʌisu di soukpʰjaʔ pɛʔ hɛʔ buk gʌi, jo ʔŋ mu�ɯm, ʔaaɔ mu�ɯm.
43 ʔŋ bɔ maɯh gʌi duʔi ʔi bjan groh ɟaɔpʰra, gʌi dun ʔi hɛʔ dʌm kalak luk ɟaɔ jʌisu taɔh, �dun ʔi, ʔi hɲɯm ɟaɔ jʌisu, ʔn ɟaɔ di bɔ gaɔh ʋain hmap gʌi. ʔn hɛʔ maɯh puoun tak pae ti.��
44 dʌiaː siŋja kalak ʔapʌitaru groh ti, naɔh pʰʌm ɟaɔpʰra bɔ th luk lɯp kʰaik naɔh dun ʔi, ʔi tʰum groh pi kalak ʔn.
45 gʌi duʔi judaː ʔi hɛʔ hɲɯm ɟaɔ jʌisu, ʔi hɛʔ th dup ʔapʌitaru, gʌi hɛʔ ʔam kasaɔ. gʌi tu dʌm jaɯ ɟaɔpʰra duaː naɔh pʰʌm ʔn, taih ʔŋ lɯp kʰaik naɔh duʔi, ʔi tu mouh ʔamjo judaː.
46 gʌi jaɯ duʔi ʔi kuj� kʰaik kak ʔakɔnʌili tʌn, hɛʔ kalak groh pi tu dʌm np gʌi bɔ ʔɯːp ɟaɔpʰra.
47 pn ti ʔapʌitaru ʋi taɔh, �naɔh pʰʌm ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ lɯp bɔ kʰaik naɔh duʔi gʌi ni. ʔŋ pi naɔh pʰʌm ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ dʌm lɯp kʰaik naɔh jʌi. kʰo, jʌi tu pʌn kʰrai gʌi kʰm di cɯp kʰaik ʔɯm.�
48 ʔn ʋi c�ou gʌi dun ʔi, taih gʌi kʰm di cɯp gʌi kʰaik ʔɯm, taih dun ʔi np, gʌi hɛʔ hɲɯm lɯp ɟaɔ jʌisu. gʌi hɛʔ hoe kʰm di cɯp kʰaik ʔɯm, gʌi ʋi hmaŋ, taih ʔapʌitaru kuj� rɯm dup gʌi ʔadaː pʰuoun pʰn siŋai.

��� 11
1 gʌi duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔ jʌisu bɔ gʌi binuk ʔi kuj� kʰaik ʔɯːk judaː, gʌi bɔ np luk gʌi duʔi ʔamjo haɔ hɛʔ hɲɯm groh ɟaɔpʰra.
2 kʰo ʔn ti ʋae ʋi th ɟm ʔapʌitaru kʰaik mɯːk jʌirusalaim, gʌi duʔi ʔamjo judaː ʔi hɛʔ hɲɯm ɟaɔ jʌisu, gʌi ʋi pʰjak ʔn.
3 gʌi taɔh, �hmaɔ ʔŋ pae pi haaɔ lɯp mai kʰaik kak gʌi duʔi ʔamjo haɔ.h hmaɔ ʔŋ pae pi hum rɯm kuj� rɯm mai dup gʌi kʰaik kak gʌi.h�
4 ʔapʌitaru ji couh di kʰai tuʔ dun mjo, taih gʌi np sikʰja luk pɛʔ hɛʔ buk ɟaɔpʰra.
5 ʔn taɔh, �ʔo hɛʔ kuj� kʰaik mɯːk jopʰa. dʌiaː sakʰaɯ ʔo, ʔo hɛʔ jaɯ ʔaruk pi bj ɟaɔpʰra di ʔo. pi jaɯ ʔo, ʔŋ pi bik tak ʔu pʰɯːn lʌih luk kʰaik gaːkhraaɔ. ʔŋ bɔ maɯh ʋn pk pʰuoun kato. ʔŋ luk ɟm di ʔaiʔ ʔo.
6 ʔo bɔ joe sikʰja, masʌi ʔŋ mouh, ʔi kuj� kʰaik bik ti. ʔo ʋi jaɯ, ʔŋ maɯh do sʔdaːʋaː mjo pʰuoun plaɔ kuj� na kʰaik. bɔ do sʔdaːʋaː ʔi kuj� kʰaik prai, bɔ ʔamjo ʔi kuj� kʰaik kadaɔ kadae, bɔ masim ʔi bɯŋ kʰaik blʌiŋ bɔ dun mjo hɛʔ kuj� na kʰaik.
7 ʔŋ bɔ maɯh groh ʔi taɔh di ʔo, �ʔɯi ʔapʌitaru, taih mai jit, ŋaɔh hum do gʌi ti.�
8 ʔo ji taɔh, �ʔɯi mai ɟaɔ, ʔaaɔ pʌn buk pae ti dʌiaː hmaɔ. ʔo tu dʌm hum pi di hum ʔi tu siŋaː, pi tu taih daːra jʌi hum.�
9 groh tʌn ʋi taɔh di ʔo, �kʰɛʔ pi buk ɟaɔpʰra taih ʔŋ siŋaː, mai kɔe taɔh, ʔŋ tu siŋaː.�
10 ʔoi cɯp ʔo ʋi jaɯ ɟaɯ ti. hɛʔ hoe, bik tʌn ʋi ho gaːkhraaɔ ʔu ɟʌiŋ.
11 dʌiaː ʔn ti ʔu ɟʌiŋ, ʔŋ ji maɯh duʔi ʔoi ʋi th ɟm kak duk kuj� ʔo. daː kaɲa ʔi ʔɯp gʌi kʰaik mɯːk kʌisarʌi tʌn, ʔn hɛʔ c�ou gʌi haaɔ ɟm duk kuj� ʔo.
12 naɔh pʰʌm ɟaɔpʰra ʋi c�ou ʔo, taih ʔo haaɔ dup gʌi, kɔe taih ʔo ɟʌiŋɟa masʌi, jo ʔŋ hman ʔaaɔ hman. bɔ gʌi binuk daɔ ʋi, ʔi kuj� di ni, gʌi hɛʔ haaɔ dup ʔo. jʌi ji th ɟm mɯːk kʌisarʌi, jʌi bɔ lɯp kʰaik kak daː kaɲa gʌi duʔi ʔi hɛʔ th dɛʔ ʔo ti.
13 dʌiaː ʔn ti daː kaɲa tʌn ʋi kalak di jʌi, taih jʌi tʰum. ʔn mɤ kʰai luk hɛʔ jaɯ ʔn ʔamu ʔamaʔ ɟaɔpʰra ʔu kadk th ɟm duk kuj� ʔn. ʔamu ʔamaʔ ɟaɔpʰra ti ʋi taɔh di ʔn, �mai lo dɛʔ duʔi mk ʔi, c�ou gʌi haaɔ mɯːk jopʰa, taih gʌi haaɔ hret duʔi ʔu ʋi, ʔi cɤ ʔasimun. ʔn cɤ bɔ ʔapʌitaru. taih gʌi dɛʔ ʔn th duk kuj� mai.
14 groh pi kalak ʔn di mai, ʔŋ di kʰjoe bɔ mai bɔ ʔŋhum mai.� pae ti ʔakɔnʌili ʋi kʰai di ʔo.
15 pn ti ʔo ʋi kalak groh ɟaɔpʰra di gʌi. dʌiaː kalak ʔo, ʔŋ bɔ maɯh naɔh pʰʌm ɟaɔpʰra th lɯp kʰaik naɔh gʌi, taih ʔŋ pi dʌiaː hɛʔ dʌm th lɯp naɔh pʰʌm ɟaɔpʰra kʰaik naɔh jʌi.
16 pn ti ʔo ji hloh groh pi dʌm kalak ɟaɔ jʌisu di jʌi. ʔn hɛʔ dʌm taɔh, �daː sara ʔajɔhan hɛʔ cɯp duʔi kʰaik ʔɯm. ʔo ji di taih naɔh pʰʌm ɟaɔpʰra lɯp kʰaik naɔh bʌi.�
17 ʋae hɲɯm gʌi ɟaɔ jʌisu ʔi hɛʔ kʰjoe gʌi, pi duaː ɟaɔpʰra di gʌi bɔ pi dʌm duaː ɟaɔpʰra di jʌi, ʔŋ mouh ʔu mjo. kʰo ʔn ti ʔo tu pʌn kʰrai ɟaɔpʰra buk pi ʔɯk ʔn.�
18 ʔapʌitaru hɛʔ hoe kalak groh ti di gʌi duʔi hɲɯm ɟaɔ jʌisu kʰaik mɯːk jʌirusalaim tʌn, gʌi tu ʋi taɔh masʌi. gʌi ʋi ʔɯːp ɟaɔpʰra. gʌi taɔh, �ʔŋ bɔ pae ti. ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ taih bɔ gʌi duʔi ʔi tu mouh ʔamjo judaː ʋi ʋain naɔh brim gʌi, taih gʌi ʋi daɯh naɔh kamae pi duaː ɟaɔpʰra di gʌi, taih bɔ gʌi pʌn di kuj� rɯm dup ɟaɔpʰra sʌisʌi.�
19 ʋae ŋaɔh jm gʌi duʔi judaː ʔasatʰʌipʰan, ʔŋ ji maɯh gʌi duʔi ʔi hɲɯm ɟaɔ jʌisu, gʌi hɛʔ ɟm douk tak. hɛʔ hoe, gʌi hɛʔ taɔ kajaɔh, haaɔ bain plo bain plo. mk ʔi, gʌi hɛʔ haaɔ tuk, ɟm mɯːk pʰinik, goun ʔɯm ʔi cɤ kʰupʰro bɔ mɯːk ʔntʰiʔo. kʰaik mɯːk gʌi ti, gʌi ʋi kalak luk ɟaɔ jʌisu di gʌi duʔi judaː diloi. gʌi tu kalak masʌi di gʌi duʔi ʔamjo haɔ.
20 ʔŋ ji maɯh duʔi ʔi hɲɯm ɟaɔ jʌisu mk ʔi, gʌi th goun ʔɯm ʔi cɤ kʰupʰro gae mɯːk kurʌiŋ. gʌi bɔ haaɔ mɯːk ʔntʰiʔo, couh di kalak di gʌi duʔi ʔamjo grik, kalak di gʌi luk ɟaɔ jʌisu kʰjoe ʔi.
21 gʌi bɔ maɯh puoun ɟaɔpʰra, taih duʔi kɯːn kɔ hɲɯm ɟaɔ jʌisu.
22 gʌi duʔi kʰaik pʰɯk ɟaɔ jʌisu, ʔi kuj� kʰaik mɯːk jʌirusalaim, gʌi bɔ np luk ʔn ti. hɛʔ hoe, gʌi ʋi tɯi ʔabanab, taih ʔn haaɔ mɯːk ʔntʰiʔo.
23 ʔn hɛʔ hoe ɟm mɯːk ʔntʰiʔo, ʔn ʋi jaɯ ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ kaʋʌi bɔ gʌi. ʔn ʋi ʔɯːp ɟaɔpʰra, ʋi mano gʌi, taih gʌi bɔkagljiʔ dup sikʰja ɟaɔ jʌisu, taih bɔ naɔh gʌi ruk kasaɔ ɟaɔ jʌisu.
24 ʔabanab hɛʔ mouh duʔi mu�ɯm. naɔh pʰʌm ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ no kʰaik naɔh ʔn. ʔn mɤ hɲɯm sikʰja ɟaɔpʰra. kʰo, bɔ gʌi duʔi kɯːn kɔ hɲɯm ʔn ɟaɔ, ʋi lɯp pʰɯk ɟaɔ jʌisu.
25 ʋae ʔn ti ʔabanab ʋi haaɔ mɯːk tʰasu, taih ʔn ʋi hret ʔasɔlu tʌn.
26 ʔn hɛʔ hoe ʋi katouŋ ʔasɔlu, ʔn ʋi dɛʔ ʔasɔlu dup ʔn, taih gae ʋi haaɔ mɯːk ʔntʰiʔo. ʔadaː ʔu sinm gae kuj� kʰaik mɯːk ti, mano gʌi duʔi kʰaik pʰɯk ɟaɔ jʌisu. kʰaik mɯːk ʔntʰiʔo tʌn, gʌi couh di taih gʌi duʔi hɲɯm ɟaɔ jʌisu cɤ duʔi kʰit. �groh �kʰit� ti, sipʰaɔ ʔn lʌih, �ʔi dup duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔpʰra��.
27 dʌiaː ʔn ti ʔŋ maɯh duʔi ʔi bjan groh ɟaɔpʰra mk ʔi, gʌi lʌih mɯːk jʌirusalaim, ʋi haaɔ mɯːk ʔntʰiʔo.
28 duʔi ʔu ʋi, ʔn cɤ ʔagaːbu. ʔn bɔ jit kalak pi bj naɔh pʰʌm ɟaɔpʰra di ʔn luk ʔi di pae na ʔaiʔ. ʔn taɔh, ʔŋ di maɯh ʔakʰaːn ʔet bum th ɟm kʰaik mɯːk dun mɯːk pi ʔɯp gʌi duʔi roma. �hɛʔ bain ʔakʰaːn ʔet bum ti dʌiaː ʔɯp kʰoundikʰm ʔakalodilk mɯːk roma�.
29 gʌi dibai ɟaɔ jʌisu, ʔi kuj� kʰaik mɯːk ʔntʰiʔo, gʌi dun ʔi taɔh di cuj� gʌi binuk ʔi kuj� kʰaik ʔɯːk judaː. dun ʔi duaː kʰɛʔ pʌn ʔn duaː.
30 pae ti, gʌi ʋi kaɟou rʌn gʌi, duaː di ʔabanab gae ʔasɔlu, taih gae ʋi duaː di daː tak ʔi ʔɯp pʰɯk ɟaɔ jʌisu.

��� 12
1 dʌiaː ʔn ti ʔŋ maɯh kʰoundikʰm ʔahʌiruʔ tʌn. ʔn hɛʔ hmet gʌi duʔi ʔi lɯp pʰɯk ɟaɔ jʌisu mk ʔi, taih gʌi kadouh douk tak.
2 ʔŋ bɔ maɯh ʔajakup, ʔi mouh ʔikʔ ʔajɔhan. kʰoundikʰm ʔahʌiruʔ hɛʔ c�ou ʔi ŋaɔh jm ʔn, ta mapuaː lak, daip giŋ ʔn.
3 ʔn bɔ np, gʌi duʔi judaː ʔɯk pi buk ʔn ɟaɯ ti, ʔn taɔh di ʋi hmet bɔ ʔapʌitaru. ʔn buk pae ti dʌiaː buk gʌi duʔi ʔisarʌil bluj� tu hp sinm brh kʰaik kʰaːmoun.
4 ʔahʌiruʔ tʌn ʋi hmet ʔapʌitaru, ʋi kʰruk ʔn kʰaik kapɯm. ʔn bɔ c�ou gʌi daː sɯk gaɯ di daɔ ʋi, taih gʌi lae kaplouʔ b�ou ʔapʌitaru ʔu ɟʌiŋ pʰuoun ʋi. ʔn taɔh di buk taih ʔŋ bain ʔamu tak ʋae hoe buk gʌi bluj� tʌn, taih gʌi duʔi kɯːn pʌn di joe dʌiaː soukpʰjaʔ gʌi ʔamu ʔn.
5 pae ti, ʔapʌitaru kuj� kʰaik kapɯm. gʌi duʔi kʰaik pʰɯk ɟaɔ jʌisu, gʌi ji sakʰaɯ sʌisʌi daːk ʔn, taih ɟaɔpʰra cuj� ʔn.
6 ʔaiʔ ɟm siŋai di soukpʰjaʔ ʔahʌiruʔ ʔamu ʔn, ʔapʌitaru hɛʔ ʔit kʰaik hmaɯ. ʔn ʔit katai daː sɯk ʔa ʋi. gʌi hɛʔ pk dai ʔn bɔ ʔa blak, taih dai ʔn kadɯk di dai daː sɯk ʔa ʋi tʌn. daː sɯk pʌiaː ʔu ʋi kuj� b�ou di ʔaiʔ maloh.
7 dʌiaː ʔn ti ʔŋ maɯh ʔamu ʔamaʔ ɟaɔpʰra th kaplouh di ʔn ʔu ɟʌiŋ. duk kuj� ʔapʌitaru kɔ blak. ʔamu ʔamaʔ ɟaɔpʰra ti hɛʔ th douh ʔapʌitaru, bjet ʔn, taih ʔn jit. ʔn taɔh di ʔapʌitaru, �taih mai jit nkgn.� dʌiaː ʔn ti ʋn hin pi pk gʌi di dai ʔn, ʋi kagaɔh coh rak ʔn.
8 pn ti ʔamu ʔamaʔ ɟaɔpʰra ʋi taɔh di ʔapʌitaru, �taih mai rit sɛʔ di ɲuj� mai, ʋi c�ɯp kʰudiŋ mai.� ʔn ʋi buk pi c�ou ʔamu ʔamaʔ ɟaɔpʰra ʔn buk. ʔamu ʔamaʔ ɟaɔpʰra pi ʋi taɔh, �taih mai c�ɯp bɔ sito tak mai haaɔ dup ʔo.� hɛʔ hoe, ʔn ʋi buk pi c�ou ʔamu ʔamaʔ ti.
9 pae ti, ʔapʌitaru ʋi lʌih kʰaik kapɯm tʌn, ʋi haaɔ dup ʔamu ʔamaʔ ɟaɔpʰra. ʔn ji tu tʰak pi buk ʔamu ʔamaʔ ɟaɔpʰra ti hɛʔ mouh ʔakʰaːkʰ�ou. ʔn tʰak, ʔŋ mouh ʔaruk pi bj ɟaɔpʰra di ʔn.
10 gae hɛʔ hoe kaloh puoun duʔi b�ou kapɯm bɔ ʔa plo, gae ʋi th ɟm maloh tak, ʔi mouh maloh hin, ʔi ʋi lɯp haaɔ kʰaik mɯːk. bɔ maloh ti ʋi ʔŋʋaɯh rak ʔn, taih gae pʌn di lʌih. gae hɛʔ hoe haaɔ dup ʔŋtʌiŋ kʰaik mɯːk, ʔamu ʔamaʔ ɟaɔpʰra bɔ hrae ʔu ɟʌiŋ.
11 ʋae ʔn ti ʔapʌitaru ʋi np, ʔŋ pae hmaɔ di ʔn. ʔn ʋi taɔh, �dʌiaː ti ni ʔo hɛʔ np sikʰja, ʔŋ mouh ɟaɔpʰra. ʔn hɛʔ tɯi ʔamu ʔamaʔ ʔn, taih ʔn kʰjoe ʔo, kɔe taih ʔahʌiruʔ pʌn di buk pi kʰram ʔn, kɔe taih ʔŋ bain pi hnaɔ ʔŋdaɔ gʌi duʔi judaː dun ʔi.�
12 ʋae hɛʔ hoe laɯh di ʔapʌitaru luk ʔn ti, ʔn ʋi haaɔ di kak nak mari ʔu ɟʌiŋ. nak mari ti, ʔn mouh ma ʔajɔhan ʔi cɤ bɔ ʔamaku. kʰaik kak nak mari ti, gʌi duʔi kɯːn hɛʔ th sakʰaɯ di ɟaɔpʰra.
13 ʔapʌitaru hɛʔ th ɟm kak ti, ʔn ʋi duj� maloh kak. ʔŋ maɯh gun ʔibɯŋ ʔu ʋi ʔi mouh daicʌiŋ kʰaik kak ti. ʔn cɤ rodʌi. gun ti bɔ taɔh di haaɔ ʋaɯh maloh.
14 ʔn ʋi jaɯ groh ʔapʌitaru, ʔn mɤ hɛʔ np ʔŋ mouh ʔapʌitaru, naɔh ʔn bɔ daːkʰɯi kasaɔ, taih ʔn kɔ piu di ʋaɯh maloh. ʔn ʋi haaɔ lɯp kʰaik kak ʔu ɟʌiŋ, taɔh di gʌi duʔi kɯːn, �ʔapʌitaru hɛʔ th kuj� di ʔaiʔ maloh.�
15 gʌi ʔi kuj� kʰaik kak tʌn ji taɔh di ʔn, �mai hɛʔ raɯ. ʔaaɔ mouh ʔn.� ʔn ji nɛʔ taɔh, �hɛʔ mouh, hɛʔ mouh.� pn ti gʌi taɔh, �ʔn hɛʔ jaɯ ʔamu ʔamaʔ ɟaɔpʰra ʔi b�ou ʔapʌitaru.�
16 ʔapʌitaru ji si nɛʔ kuj� duj� maloh. hɛʔ hoe, gʌi bɔ haaɔ ʋaɯh maloh. gʌi ʋi ʔam kasaɔ luk ʔn ti.
17 pn ti ʔapʌitaru ʋi co dai ʔn, taih gʌi tʰum groh ʔn. hɛʔ hoe, ʔn ʋi kʰai tuʔ, taih gʌi np sikʰja luk pi pae ɟaɔpʰra di buk, taih ʔn pʌn di lʌih kʰaik kapɯm tʌn. ʔn hɛʔ hoe kalak tuʔ, ʔn ʋi taɔh, �taih bʌi kʰai tuʔ ɟaɯ ti di ʔajakup bɔ gʌi binuk ʔi tu kuj� di ni, taih bɔ gʌi np luk ʔn ti.� ʔapʌitaru hɛʔ hoe kalak groh ti, ʔn ʋi lʌih kʰaik kak gʌi ti, ʋi haaɔ pʌiaː ʔu plo.
18 paː kʰaihɲa siŋʋh, gʌi daː sɯk ʋi sinn sinɯːk kup tu np gʌi hmaɔ ʔŋ pae, ʔapʌitaru sɔ np di hrae.
19 kʰoundikʰm ʔahʌiruʔ tʌn ji taih gʌi hret sikʰja ʔapʌitaru. gʌi hɛʔ hoe hret, ji tu jaɯ ʔn. pn ti ʔn ʋi dimu�ʔ sikʰja gʌi daː sɯk ʔi b�ou kapɯm tʌn, hɛʔ hoe ʔn ʋi duaː ʔamik taih gʌi ŋaɔh jm daː sɯk dun ʔi, ʔi hɛʔ b�ou ʔapʌitaru.
ʋae ʔn ti kʰoundikʰm ʔahʌiruʔ tʌn ʋi lʌih kʰaik ʔɯːk judaː, ʋi haaɔ kuj� kʰaik mɯːk kʌisarʌi. 20 ʔn ji ru kasaɔ di duʔi kʰaik mɯːk tʰuro gae mɯːk sidun. gʌi duʔi kʰaik mɯːk ʔa mɯːk ti, gʌi ji lo caɯh pi di hum gʌi kʰaik mɯːk pi ʔɯp ʔahʌiruʔ tʌn. kʰo ʔn ti bɔ ʔa mɯːk ti hɛʔ lae pʰrum, taih gʌi tɯi duʔi mk ʔi haaɔ ɟm di ʔaiʔ kʰoundikʰm ʔahʌiruʔ, taih ʔn kaplouʔ naɔh, taih ʔn ʋi kalaɔ di gʌi. ʔaiʔ haaɔ gʌi duk kuj� kʰoundikʰm ʔahʌiruʔ, gʌi hɛʔ hoe kalak groh di ʔablatʰu, ʔi ʔɯp krokram kʰoundikʰm ʔahʌiruʔ, taih bɔ ʔn ʋi bain gɯk gʌi.
21 siŋai di th ɟm gʌi di ʔaiʔ kʰoundikʰm ʔahʌiruʔ ti, ʔn hɛʔ c�ɯp kʰrɯk kʰoundikʰm ʔn bɔ kuj� daik malak ʔn. ʔn mɤ kalak groh taih duʔi dun ʔi tʰum.
22 gʌi duʔi kɯːn ʔi jaɯ groh ʔn ti, gʌi ʋi kapʰrum di dʔ dun ʔi taɔh, �groh ʔn mouh groh ɟaɔpʰra, ʔaaɔ mouh groh duʔi.� ʔahʌiruʔ mɤ ʔɯk gʌi ʔɯːp ʔn. ʔn tu taɔh, gʌi lo ʔɯːp mi ɟaɔpʰra.
23 kʰo ʔn ti ɟaɔpʰra mɤ tɯi ʔamu ʔamaʔ ʔn ʔu kadk, taih ʔn dm hmap di ʔahʌiruʔ ʔu ɟʌiŋ. hɛʔ hoe, mkprʔ bɔ hum jk ʔn, taih ʔn kɔ jm.
24 dʌiaː ʔn ti gʌi duʔi kɯːn mɤ tʰum groh ɟaɔpʰra, bɔ maɯh duʔi kɯːn ʔi hɲɯm ɟaɔ jʌisu.
25 ʔi mouh ʔabanab gae ʔasɔlu tʌn, gae hɛʔ hoe tɯi rʌn duaː di gʌi duʔi hɲɯm ɟaɔ jʌisu kʰaik mɯːk jʌirusalaim, gae mɤ ʋi ʋiu mɯːk ʔntʰiʔo. gae hɛʔ dɛʔ bɔ ʔajɔhan, ʔi cɤ bɔ ʔamaku, taih bɔ ʔn haaɔ rɯm dup gae.

��� 13
1 katai gʌi duʔi kʰaik pʰɯk ɟaɔ jʌisu ʔi kuj� kʰaik mɯːk ʔntʰiʔo, ʔŋ maɯh duʔi ʔi bjan groh ɟaɔpʰra bɔ gʌi daː sara ʔi mano daːra ɟaɔpʰra mk ʔi, gʌi cɤ ʔabanab, ʔasimʌiʔun ʔi cɤ bɔ ʔanikʌi, ʔalusi ʔi th mɯːk kurʌiŋ, bɔ ʔamanʌin ʔi hɛʔ bain gɯk kʰoundikʰm ʔahʌiruʔ siŋ ditaiʔ ʔn, bɔ ʔasɔlu tʌn.
2 ʔu siŋai, gʌi kuj� rɯm, krɯp sakʰaɯ ɟaɔpʰra. gʌi bɔ jɯːn pi di hum gʌi. dʌiaː ʔn ti naɔh pʰʌm ɟaɔpʰra kalak groh di gʌi taɔh, �ʔo hɛʔ dʌm raɔh duʔi ʔa ʋi kʰaik pʰɯk bʌi. dʌiaː ti ni, taih ʔasɔlu gae ʔabanab ʋi kajaɔh bʌi, taih gae pʌn di buk gaːn pi dʌm c�ou ʔo gae buk.�
3 pn ti gʌi ʋi sakʰaɯ pʌiaː ʔu ɟʌiŋ bɔ ʋi jɯːn pi di hum. hɛʔ hoe, gʌi ʋi daːk dai gʌi daik giŋ gae, kʰʋaːk gae haaɔ.
4 pae ti, naɔh pʰʌm ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ hoe tɯi gae haaɔ, gae mɤ haaɔ ɟm mɯːk salukʰi. bɔ ʔamaku ʔi cɤ bɔ ʔajɔhan hɛʔ dup gae bɔ cuj� gae. gʌi ʔoi ʋi paɔ raɯ skpʰo, haaɔ ɟm ʔu plo ʔi mouh goun ʔɯm ʔi cɤ kʰupʰro.
5 gʌi hɛʔ ɟm mɯːk salami, ʔi kuj� daik goun ʔɯm ti, gʌi ʋi haaɔ ho daːra ɟaɔpʰra kʰaik ɟuk krɯp gʌi duʔi judaː ɟaɔpʰra.
6 gʌi bɔ haaɔ ɟm dun na dun plo daik goun ʔɯm tʌn, taih kɔ ɟm mɯːk pʰapʰu. kʰaik mɯːk ti, gʌi katouŋ duʔi judaː ʔu ʋi, ʔi mouh daː sara ʔi np di buk mjhlɛʔ. ʔn kalo taɔh, ʔn mouh duʔi ʔi bjan groh ɟaɔpʰra. duʔi ti, ʔn cɤ ʔabajʌisu.
7 ʔn kuj� rɯm dup daː kaɲa ʔi ʔɯp mɯːk. daː kaɲa ti, ʔn cɤ ʔasʌirakʰi pʌiaːlu. ʔn maɯh ʔaŋjan. ʔn bɔ dɛʔ ʔasɔlu gae ʔabanab, taih gae th duk kuj� ʔn, kalak groh ɟaɔpʰra di ʔn.
8 ʔŋ ji mouh daː sara ʔi np di buk mjhlɛʔ tʌn. ʔn cɤ bɔ ʔaʔʌilimaʔ. ʔn ji tu ʔɯk gae. ʔn tʰʌiaɔ di kʰrai daː kaɲa tʌn, kɔe taih ʔn hɲɯm ɟaɔ jʌisu.
9 ʔasɔlu tʌn, ʔn cɤ bɔ ʔapʌiaːlu, ʔn ji ŋʌp kʰaim ʔaʔʌilimaʔ. naɔh pʰʌm ɟaɔpʰra mɤ hɛʔ no kʰaik naɔh ʔn. ʔn ʋi taɔh,
10 �mai mouh gun kanm hae, ʔi cɤ satan. kʰɛʔ bɔ maɯh na boe, mai tu ʔɯk. mai bɔ mouh duʔi ʔi np di kalo sʌisʌi. hmaɔ ʔŋ pae pi tʰʌiaɔ mai di buk, taih ʔŋtʌiŋ sɤ, ʔŋtʌiŋ boe ʋi bain ʔŋtʌiŋ tu boe.
11 dʌiaː ti ni, taih mai joe, ɟaɔpʰra di buk taih ŋae mai ʔp, kɔe taih mai pʌn di jaɯ masʌi. ʔŋ di hlʌiŋ, mai tu di pʌn jaɯ blak siŋai.� ʔapʌiaːlu hɛʔ hoe kalak groh ti, ŋae ʔn mɤ ʔp ʔu ɟʌiŋ. ʔn bɔ ʋin di boun, hret duʔi ʔi di paː dai ʔn, tɯi ʔn haaɔ.
12 daː kaɲa tʌn hɛʔ hoe jaɯ ɟaɯ ti, ʔn mɤ ʔam kasaɔ di daːra ɟaɔpʰra ti, ʔŋ taih ʔn kɔ hɲɯm ɟaɔpʰra.
13 ʋae ʔn ti daː sara ʔapʌiaːlu bɔ duʔi ʔi dup ʔn, gʌi ʋi paɔ raɯ skpʰo, ɟm mɯːk pʰʌirʌigʌi, ʔi kuj� kʰaik ʔɯːk ʔi cɤ pʰmpʰuli. dʌiaː kuj� gʌi duk ti, ʔamaku tʌn ʔi cɤ bɔ ʔajɔhan, ʔn ʔaaɔ hu dup ʔabanab gae ʔapʌiaːlu. ʔn ʋi ʋiu mɯːk jʌirusalaim.
14 ʔabanab gae ʔapʌiaːlu ʋi lʌih kʰaik mɯːk pʰʌirʌigʌi tʌn, haaɔ mɯːk ʔntʰiʔo ʔi kuj� kʰaik ʔɯːk pʰisidi. dʌiaː ɟm siŋai dihlaɔ, gae ʋi haaɔ kʰaik ɟuk krɯp gʌi duʔi judaː ɟaɔpʰra, tʰum pi kalak gʌi.
15 gʌi hɛʔ hoe tih tʰm daːra bɔ tʰm pi daim ʔoun duʔi ʔi bjan groh ɟaɔpʰra, gʌi daː ʔi ʔɯp kʰaik ɟuk ti, gʌi ʋi taɔh di ʔapʌiaːlu gae, �ʔɯi bae binuk, sʌi bae maɯh groh pi di mano ʔi, taih bae mano bɔ jʌi.�
16 pn ti ʔapʌiaːlu bɔ jit, co dai ʔn taɔh, �ʔɯi bʌi duʔi ʔisarʌil bɔ bʌi duʔi ʔamjo haɔ, bʌi mouh duʔi ʔi hɲɯm ɟaɔpʰra ʔakʰaːkʰ�ou. taih bʌi tʰum groh ʔo.
17 ɟaɔpʰra pi krɯp ʔʌi duʔi ʔamjo ʔisarʌil, ʔn hɛʔ dʌm raɔh gouŋ dk ʔʌi kʰaː ʔaiʔ. dʌiaː kuj� gʌi kʰaik mɯːk ʔaigɯp tʌn, ʔn hɛʔ raɔh gʌi, hɛʔ taih gʌi ʋi bain duʔi kɯːn, duʔi ʔamjo tak. hɛʔ hoe, ʔn ʋi bj kʰɛʔ tak puoun ʔn, dʌiaː lʌih gʌi kʰaik mɯːk ʔaigɯp.
18 ʔadaː pʰuoun gaɯ sinm ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ joe lɯmla gʌi dʌiaː haaɔ gʌi kʰaik prai kahaɔh.
19 dʌiaː ʔn ti kʰaik mɯːk kanŋ ni, hɛʔ maɯh duʔi bu mjo. ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ taih gʌi c�ɯm tuʔ. hɛʔ hoe pae ti, ʔn ʋi daɯh man mɯːk duʔi gʌi ti, taih ʔŋ ʋi bain man mɯːk ʔamjo ʔʌi. pɛʔ hɛʔ buk ɟaɔpʰra ɟaɯ ti dun mjo, ʔŋ mouh kanou pʰuoun majaɔh di pʰn gaɯ sinm.
20 pn ti ɟaɔpʰra duaː gʌi maɯh daː sara ʔi soukpʰjaʔ ʔamu gʌi, taih ʔŋ kɔ ɟm ban dʌiaː kuj� duʔi ʔi bjan groh ɟaɔpʰra, ʔi cɤ ʔasamuʔʌin.
21 dʌiaː ʔn ti gʌi duʔi ʔisarʌil si pʌn kʰoundikʰm. gʌi hmaŋ, taih ɟaɔpʰra duaː di gʌi. hɛʔ hoe, ɟaɔpʰra ʋi duaː gʌi maɯh kʰoundikʰm ʔi cɤ ʔasɔlu. gouŋ ʔn cɤ ʔakisa, ʔi mouh kʰraɯ ʔabʌinjam. ʔadaː pʰuoun gaɯ sinm kʰoundikʰm ʔasɔlu hɛʔ ʔɯp mɯːk gʌi.
22 hɛʔ hoe, ɟaɔpʰra ʋi blua ʋain ʔn, kɔe hu taih ʔn ʔɯp mɯːk, ʋi taih ʔadaːʋit bain kʰoundikʰm ʔi ʔɯp gʌi. ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ kalak luk ʔadaːʋit taɔh, �ʔo hɛʔ jaɯ ʔadaːʋit ʔi mouh gun ʔajʌisʌi. ʔn mouh duʔi pi ʔɯk ʔo. ʔn di buk tuʔ dun mjo, taih ʔŋ laɔ naɔh ʔo.�
23 ʔŋ ji mouh hloukhlan ʔadaːʋit tʌn ʔu ʋi. ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ taɔh di taih ʔn bain duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔpʰra taih ʔn kʰjoe duʔi. ʔn cɤ ʔajʌisu.
24 ʔaiʔ th ʔajʌisu daik kadae, ʔŋ jɛʔ hɛʔ maɯh daː sara ʔajɔhan. ʔn hɛʔ ho daːra ɟaɔpʰra di gʌi duʔi ʔisarʌil bɔ mɯːk, taih gʌi hloh hmap gʌi, ʋain na tu mu�ɯm, taih ʔn cɯp gʌi kʰaik ʔɯm.
25 ʔaiʔ tuʔ ʔasak daː sara ʔajɔhan ti, ʔn hɛʔ taɔh, �bʌi tʰak ʔo mouh ʔasʌi.h ʔo tu mouh duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔpʰra. taih bʌi sadik. duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔpʰra, ʔn di th di pn ʔo. ʋn kʰudiŋ ʔn mɤ, ʔo hɲm kaʔap gaɔh.�
26 ʔɯi bʌi binuk, bʌi hloukhlan daː ʔabrahm, bɔ bʌi duʔi ʔamjo haɔ, ʔi hɲɯm ɟaɔpʰra ʔakʰaːkʰ�ou, ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ taih ʔʌi dun ʔi tʰum luk duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔpʰra, ʔi kʰjoe duʔi.
27 gʌi duʔi ʔi kuj� mɯːk jʌirusalaim bɔ gʌi daː kaɲa ʔi ʔɯp gʌi, gʌi bɔkagljiʔ tu np, ʔajʌisu tʌn mouh duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔpʰra taih ʔn kʰjoe duʔi. gʌi mɤ tu np pi daim ʔoun gʌi duʔi ʔi bjan groh ɟaɔpʰra, pi tih gʌi taih ʔi tʰum dun ɟʌiŋ dun ɟʌiŋ dʌiaː ɟm siŋai dihlaɔ. dʌiaː dm gʌi hmap di ʔajʌisu, gʌi ji buk pi dʌm kalak gʌi duʔi ʔi bjan groh ɟaɔpʰra.
28 gʌi tu jaɯ hmap pi kaʔap ʔn jm. gʌi ji hmaŋ di ʔapʰilaʔ, taih ʔn kʰʋaːk gʌi ŋaɔh ʋain ʔn.
29 pae ti, gʌi hɛʔ hoe buk tuʔ dun mjo pi dʌm daim ʔoun kʰaik bp ɟaɔpʰra luk ʔn. gʌi ʋi daɯh do buk ʔn, daɯh luk daik ruk kaʋɛʔ, ʋi blʌih ʔoun ʔn kʰaik kadaɔ barʌiaɔ.
30 ɟaɔpʰra ji taih ʔn ʋi jit ʋi ʔim, taih ʔn ʋi lʌih kʰaik kadaɔ barʌiaɔ.
31 hɛʔ hoe, bain siŋai bain siŋai, ʔajʌisu ʋi kaplouh di duʔi ʔi dʌm haaɔ rɯm dup ʔn, dʌiaː lʌih ʔn kʰaik ʔɯːk gaːlilʌi, ʋi haaɔ mɯːk jʌirusalaim. gʌi duʔi ʔi jaɯ ʔn ʋae hɛʔ ʋi jit ʋi ʔim ʔn, gʌi hɛʔ ʋi bain sksʌi, bɔ np di kalak luk ʔn, taih gʌi duʔi ʔamjo ʔʌi kɔ np.
32 bɔ jae ʋi kalak, taih bɔ bʌi ʋi np luk ʔn ti. kadik sʔɟa pi dʌm duaː ɟaɔpʰra di gouŋ dk ʔʌi, ʔn hɛʔ hoe buk,
33 taih ʔŋ bain ʔagjaɯ di ʔʌi, ʔi mouh hloukhlan gʌi. ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ taih ɟaɔ jʌisu ʋi jit ʋi ʔim, taih ʔŋ pi pi dʌm daim kʰaik bp pi hmo tʰm. kʰaik kʰaːn haʔa hɛʔ taɔh, �mai mouh gun ʔo. ʔataɯ ni ʔo hɛʔ bain gouŋ mai.�
34 pʌiaː ʔu plo ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ kalak di ʔaiʔ luk ɟaɔ jʌisu di ʋi jit ʋi ʔim ʋae jm ʔn. ʔŋ taɔh, �mukkara boe, gʌi mukkara ʔi hman ʔakʰaːkʰ�ou, pi dʌm duaː ʔo di kʰoundikʰm ʔadaːʋit, ʔo di ʋi duaː bɔ di bʌi.�
35 hɛʔ daim ʔoun kʰaik bp ɟaɔpʰra pʌiaː ʔu kʰaːn taɔh, �mai ɟaɔpʰra, mai tu taih duʔi boe mai ʋi ʔouh ʔm, tu taih jk ʔn laiʔ.�
36 ʔi mouh kʰoundikʰm ʔadaːʋit, ʔn hɛʔ hoe buk pi ʔɯk ɟaɔpʰra, ʔn bɔ jm. gʌi ʋi dip do buk ʔn pi gouŋ daː ʔn. hɛʔ hoe, do ʔn ʋi laiʔ.
37 ʔŋ ji mouh duʔi pi taih ɟaɔpʰra ʋi jit ʋi ʔim ʋae jm ʔn, duʔi ti tu jaɯ do buk ʔn laiʔ.
38 kʰo ʔn ti ʔo taɔh di bʌi binuk ʔo, taih bɔ bʌi np, ɟaɔ jʌisu pai di gaɔh ʋain hmap bʌi.
39 ʔasʌi hɲɯm ɟaɔ jʌisu, ɟaɔpʰra di taɔh, ʔn hɛʔ pʌn naɔh hman. daːra pi dʌm duaː daː sara ʔamosai tʌn, ʔŋ tu pai di taih duʔi maɯh naɔh hman ɟaɯ ti.
40 kʰo ʔn ti bʌi lo sadik, kɔe taih ʔŋ bain di bʌi pi dʌm kalak duʔi ʔi bjan groh ɟaɔpʰra ʔu ʋi. daː sara ti hɛʔ dʌm taɔh,
41 �ʔɯi bʌi duʔi ʔi kaɲh na boe, taih bʌi ʔam pi buk ɟaɔpʰra, taih bʌi ji c�ɯm. dʌiaː mouh co bʌi, ʔo di buk na boe. bʌi ji tu hɲɯm pi buk ʔo ɟaɯ ti. ʔŋ pi bɔ maɯh duʔi ʔi bj taih bʌi joe mɤ, bʌi tu hɲɯm dʌiaː hmaɔ.�� pae ti ʔapʌiaːlu mano kʰaik ɟuk tʌn.
42 dʌiaː ʋi taɔh ʔapʌiaːlu gae ʔabanab di lʌih kʰaik ɟuk tʌn, gʌi duʔi ʋi hmaŋ, taih gae ʋi th pʌiaː ʔu ɟʌiŋ. hi ɟm siŋai dihlaɔ pʌiaː ʔu ɟʌiŋ, taih gae ʋi mano luk ʔn ti.
43 gʌi hɛʔ hoe krɯp ɟaɔpʰra, gʌi mɤ ʋi lʌih kʰaik ɟuk ti. ʔŋ maɯh gʌi duʔi judaː bɔ gʌi duʔi ʔamjo haɔ ʔi hɛʔ lɯp duʔi judaː, gʌi kɯːn haaɔ dup ʔapʌiaːlu gae ʔabanab. gae ʋi kalak groh di duʔi gʌi ti, kasouh gʌi, taih gʌi hɲɯm bɯk ɟaɔpʰra ʔi maɯh naɔh kaʋʌi gʌi.
44 hɛʔ ʋi ɟm siŋai dihlaɔ pʌiaː ʔu ɟʌiŋ, gʌi duʔi bɔ mɯːk ʋi th kaɟou, taih gʌi ʋi tʰum groh ɟaɔpʰra.
45 gʌi duʔi judaː, gʌi ji joe, ʔŋ maɯh duʔi kɯːn kasaɔ, ʔŋ bɔ bain naɔh hlj� di gʌi. kʰo, gʌi taɔh, daːra pi kalak ʔapʌiaːlu gae ʔabanab, ʔaaɔ hman, ʔaaɔ mu�ɯm. gʌi bɔ kalak groh kakʰaiŋ di ɟaɔpʰra.
46 gae ji kalak groh sɤ di duʔi judaː gʌi ti taɔh, �jae lo kalak groh ɟaɔpʰra, taih bʌi np di tʰum ʔaiʔ tʰum ʔi haɔ. bʌi ji hɛʔ ʋain daːra ɟaɔpʰra ti. ʔŋ pi bʌi tʰak bʌi tu kaʔap kuj� rɯm dup ɟaɔpʰra sʌisʌi. kʰo, bɔ jae di blʌih ʋain bʌi, ʋi haaɔ kalak taih gʌi duʔi ʔamjo haɔ pʌn di tʰum luk ʔn ti.
47 ɟaɔpʰra hɛʔ dʌm c�ou jae buk pae ti. ʔn hɛʔ dʌm taɔh, �ʔo hɛʔ buk taih mai pi blak ʔi th ɟm duk kuj� duʔi dun mjo, taih mai haaɔ ɟm dun na dun plo, taih ʔi np luk ɟaɔpʰra kʰjoe duʔi.��
48 dʌiaː tʰum gʌi duʔi ʔamjo haɔ groh ti, ʔŋ ʋi bain naɔh daːkʰɯi di gʌi. gʌi bɔ rosʌi daːra ɟaɔpʰra. kʰɛʔ maɯh duʔi pi raɔh ɟaɔpʰra, taih gʌi pʌn ʔasak kamae ʔi kuj� sʌisʌi, gʌi dun ʔi bɔ hɲɯm ɟaɔpʰra.
49 pn ti gʌi duʔi kʰaik mɯːk bɔ mɯːk kɔ np luk groh ɟaɔpʰra.
50 kʰaik mɯːk ʔntʰiʔo ti, ʔŋ ji maɯh ʔibɯŋ mk ʔi, gʌi maɯh ʔaja di soukpʰjaʔ luk man mɯːk. gʌi bɔ krɯp ɟaɔpʰra ʔakʰaːkʰ�ou. gʌi duʔi judaː, gʌi th kalak groh, taih bɔ gʌi ʔibɯŋ ti bɔ gʌi daː tak ʔi ʔɯp mɯːk bain naɔh tu ʔɯk ʔapʌiaːlu gae ʔabanab, taih gʌi lae pʰrum di buk na tu mu�ɯm di gae. hɛʔ hoe, taih gʌi ʋi souʔ gae lʌih kʰaik mɯːk gʌi.
51 pn ti gae dijaɯh kapouh di plaɔ gae, taih gʌi duʔi judaː np, gae tu maɯh hmap masʌi. hɛʔ hoe, gae ʋi haaɔ ɟm mɯːk ʔikʰoni.
52 gʌi dibai ɟaɔ jʌisu ʔi kuj� di pn kʰaik mɯːk ʔntʰiʔo ti, gʌi ji maɯh naɔh daːkʰɯi kasaɔ. naɔh pʰʌm ɟaɔpʰra mɤ hɛʔ no kʰaik naɔh gʌi.

��� 14
1 dʌiaː ʔn ti kʰaik mɯːk ʔikʰoni, ʔapʌiaːlu gae ʔabanab, ʋi haaɔ lɯp kʰaik ɟuk krɯp gʌi duʔi judaː ɟaɔpʰra. gae ʋi mano sikʰja, taih gʌi duʔi kɯːn kɔ hɲɯm ɟaɔ jʌisu. bɔ duʔi judaː bɔ duʔi grik, gʌi kɯːn kɔ hɲɯm.
2 gʌi duʔi judaː ʔi tu si hɲɯm ɟaɔ jʌisu, gʌi ʋi kalak groh tu mu�ɯm di duʔi ʔamjo haɔ, taih gʌi ru di binuk ʔi hɲɯm ɟaɔ jʌisu.
3 ʔapʌiaːlu gae ʔabanab ji ʋi kuj� hlʌiŋ kʰaik mɯːk ti, tu jo di kalak luk ɟaɔpʰra kʰjoe duʔi. ɟaɔpʰra mɤ bj puoun ʔn, taih gae bɔ buk na mu�ɯm ʔam kasaɔ. pae ti ɟaɔpʰra mɤ taih dun ʔi np, groh pi kalak gae luk ɟaɔpʰra kaʋʌi duʔi, ʔŋ hɛʔ hman, hɛʔ mouh.
4 gʌi duʔi kʰaik mɯːk ti, gʌi ji tu lae pʰrum. mk ʔi gʌi ʔɯk duʔi pi raɔh pi tɯi ɟaɔ jʌisu. mk ʔi gʌi dup naɔh gʌi duʔi judaː.
5 bɔ gʌi duʔi judaː, bɔ gʌi duʔi ʔamjo haɔ, bɔ gʌi daː tak ʔi ʔɯp gʌi, gʌi hɛʔ kʰram di buk na tu mu�ɯm di ʔapʌiaːlu gae ʔabanab. hɛʔ hoe, gʌi taɔh di daɯh maaɔ ʋɯŋ, taih gae jm.
6 dʌiaː ʔn ti gae mɤ hɛʔ np luk pi kʰram gʌi di buk. kʰo, gae ʋi lʌih kʰaik mɯːk ti, ʋi taɔ haaɔ, ɟm mɯːk lutʰara gae mɯːk dʌibʌi ʔi kuj� kʰaik ʔɯːk lukɔni.
7 kʰaik mɯːk ʔa mɯːk ti bɔ kʰaik raɔ ʔi kuj� katʔ mɯːk ti, gae ʋi kalak luk ɟaɔpʰra kʰjoe duʔi.
8 kʰaik mɯːk lutʰara tʌn, ʔŋ maɯh duʔi ʔu ʋi, plaɔ ʔn hɛʔ jm. ʔu siŋ dʌiaː gʌʔ ʔn, ʔn tu pʌn jit haaɔ dʌiaː hmaɔ.
9 duʔi ti, ʔn tʰum groh pi kalak ʔapʌiaːlu tʌn. ʔapʌiaːlu bɔ joe sikʰja duʔi ti, ʔn bɔ np, duʔi saɔ ti hɛʔ hɲɯm ɟaɔpʰra pai di pikain ʔn.
10 pn ti ʔn ʋi kalak groh tak taɔh, �mai jit, cuk sun plaɔ mai.� hɛʔ hoe kalak, duʔi ti mɤ jit, cuk ɟap haaɔ ʔu ɟʌiŋ.
11 gʌi duʔi kɯːn ʔi hɛʔ jaɯ pi buk ʔapʌiaːlu, gʌi ʋi couh di dʔ tak kʰaik groh lukɔni. gʌi taɔh, �ɟaɔpʰra ʔa kadk hɛʔ bain duʔi, hɛʔ th ɟm duk kuj� ʔʌi.�
12 gʌi bɔ taɔh, ʔabanab mouh ɟaɔ sus, bɔ ʔapʌiaːlu mouh ɟaɔ hʌirʌimʌi. ɟaɔ gae ʔa kadk ti mouh ɟaɔpʰra pi krɯp gʌi. kup kalak ʔapʌiaːlu groh kɯːn di gʌi, gʌi taɔh, ʔn mouh ɟaɔ hʌirʌimʌi pi krɯp gʌi.
13 gʌi hɛʔ hoe taɔh pae ti, ʔŋ bɔ maɯh duʔi ʔi hlu di ɟaɔ sus tʌn. ho pi krɯp gʌi ʔn ɟaɔ sus kuj� na ret mɯːk. daː sara ti, ʔn th tɯi mk ʔaluk mk do bɔ kaʋk boh, th ɟm di bak maloh mɯːk. bɔ ʔn bɔ duʔi kɯːn taɔh di hlu kro ɟaɯ ti di ʔapʌiaːlu gae ʔabanab.
14 dʌiaː jaɯ gae luk ʔn ti, gae tu ʔɯk. gae kajaiʔ sito gae kup tu ʔɯk gae. hɛʔ hoe, gae ʋi lʌih haaɔ duk kuj� gʌi duʔi kɯːn, dʔ tak, taih gʌi tʰum.
